what_is:
RoboForm is the number one password safety solution for businesses. It works to eliminate weak, reused, forgotten, and vulnerable passwords, as well as productivity and financial costs related to password resets. 

RoboForm for Business is highly customizable and can be tailored through a variety of custom policies set by Admins. The RoboForm Admin Console provides easy onboarding of employees and centralized password management across all platforms. 

Key features of RoboForm for Business include: 
•	Centralized employee onboarding
•	Centralized policy deployment
•	End-to-end encryption
•	Secure group sharing
•	Role-based access permissions
•	Active Directory integration
•	Password audit for users and groups
•	Advanced reporting 
•	Two-factor authentication
product_description: RoboForm is an application that can assist you in speeding up your Internet experience by bookmarking sites and entering previously saved passwords.Seller DetailsSellerSiber SystemsCompany Websitewww.roboform.comPhone1-703-218-1851Year Founded1995HQ LocationFairfax, VATwitter@roboform20,881 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com57 employees on LinkedIn®DescriptionSiber Systems is a privately-held company, headquartered in Fairfax, Virginia. Our flagship products, RoboForm and GoodSync, are used by millions of people worldwide. Our customers range from individual users and small businesses, to government agencies and leading Fortune 500 companies.STOverview Provided by:Stanko Tomic

what_is: GitHub is where the world builds software. Millions of individuals, organizations and businesses around the world use GitHub to discover, share, and contribute software. Developers at startups to Fortune 50 companies use GitHub, every step of the way.
product_description: GitHub is the best place to share code with friends, co-workers, classmates, and complete strangers. Over two million people use GitHub to build amazing things together.GitHub delivers everything best-in-class organizations need to bring new ideas to market, from concept to customer. The complete developer experience blends the best of your team and the open-source community to create unmatched customer experiences fast and securely.Seller DetailsSellerGitHubCompany Websitegithub.comYear Founded2008HQ LocationSan Francisco, CATwitter@github2,573,407 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com5,655 employees on LinkedIn®DescriptionGitHub Inc. provides code hosting services. It allows users to share codes with friends, co-workers, classmates, and strangers; offers control system for the collaborative development of software; allows users to fork, send pull requests, and manage various public and private repositories; and offers collaborator management, wikis, downloads, code review, and graphs. The company allows individuals and team members to discuss about codes; and track and assign issues to other teammates. GitHub Inc. was founded in 2008 and is based in San Francisco, California.SLOverview Provided by:Sophie Legrand

what_is: Technology will always be evolving, but engagement is timeless. Engaged customers generate more revenue and often become your advocates. At Right On Interactive, we’ve seen profitable growth sustained when marketers view engagement as a journey, not just a campaign. So we’ve designed our software to automate the concept of Customer Lifecycle Marketing, providing visibility into who is the best-fit and the most engaged for an organization at each stage of the customer journey — from prospect to raving fan. Our cloud-based solution maps the customer’s entire brand experience, from messaging through product usage. Marketers and sales teams can know exactly where a prospect or customer is in their relationship with a brand, and how best to approach them to maximize lifetime value. At Right On Interactive, we believe in attracting and acquiring the best-fit customers for life.

API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

    Based On Number Of Reviews: 13

what_is:
Founded in 1984, Entrinsik is an established, global software company based in Raleigh, North Carolina. Over 3,000 organizations in many industries around the world use Entrinsik software every day. Our state of the art solutions improve efficiency, productivity, and streamline daily operations

Informer 5 is a robust, extensible data discovery and analytics platform that simplifies the process of accessing, cleansing, blending, and analyzing on-prem and cloud data. Aggregate disparate data using a single web-based platform to create a cohesive, curated, governed data hub for self-service data analysis. Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics. Informer is used extensively within various industries including Higher Education, Insurance, Manufacturing & Distribution, Healthcare, Public Safety, Not-for-Profit, Government, CRM, and many others.

Informer Embedded is the perfect choice for software applications looking to provide purposeful, self-service analytics within or complementing their solution. Integration is quick and seamless with our heavily experienced and results-driven in-house team. You can choose your integration path with options from inlined content to external, connected but separate full applications. All options are entirely customizable and white-labeled to match the look and feel of your brand flawlessly so that you can provide critical insights without having to sacrifice your software’s identity.

Contact us at informersales@entrinsik.com, 888-703-0016 for access to the Informer Sandbox to get a feel for the platform on your own or to schedule a one-on-one conversation or demo. Let us help you uncover insights in your data.

Our Google Chrome extension, smooth interface, and comprehensive dashboard highlight a user experience that’s always looking forward, helping you quickly find and connect with your next customer and skate circles around the competition.

what_is:
BrightLocal is a dedicated local SEO platform.

Its powerful local SEO tools and reports allow agencies and brands to improve local rankings, generate more traffic and leads from local search, and manage reviews/reputation.

Over 5,000 innovative agencies and brands like iProspect, Mediacom, Hilton, and Ikea trust BrightLocal to improve their local search visibility through its industry-leading platform. These companies achieve this through BrightLocal's SEO Audits and Reports, Listings Service and Management Tools, and its Online Reputation Management solution.

With BrightLocal, customers experience better local search results, a huge portion of time saved, and a cleaner way to showcase local search success to key stakeholders.

Plans start from $39/month, with a free 14-day trial available with no card required.

Among many awards, G2's audience of users has ranked BrightLocal as Summer 2023 software leader across a total of four categories:

- Local Listings Management
- Local SEO
- Local Marketing
- Online Reputation Management

what_is:
Sked Social lets you simplify social media management with the power of AI. Packed with AI-optimized tools, Sked brings everything brands and agencies need to manage their socials, from planning and scheduling to engagement and reporting.

Collaborate effortlessly with unlimited users, enjoy a streamlined approvals workflow, and get human support 24/7. All for a price you can justify. Plus, we're always in tune with your needs—constantly shipping new features that are both functional and innovative.

With Sked, you get everything basic social schedulers are missing, without writing a blank check for an enterprise platform. Our AI-driven platform provides you with unlimited options to support your growth - unlimited users, unlimited posting, and unlimited AI. We offer an extensive list of supported social networks, advanced Instagram publishing capabilities, best-in-class collaboration and approvals workflows, and comprehensive insights for teams to succeed with their social goals.

what_is:
One solution to manage both your online meeting and webinar needs. The best solution for your remote collaboration for the hybrid work.
Online meeting or web conferencing is a rapidly growing segment of the Internet as more businesses opt to connect with customers and partners remotely. Zoho Meeting is the easiest and most affordable online web conferencing tool to enhance the business collaboration with screen/application sharing, audio, and video conferencing. It provides single users as well as small and large size organizations, a quick and easy way to host and conduct secure and cost-effective online meetings. Host product launches, feature demonstrations, sales presentations, lead-nurturing webinars, user education webinars, and online meetings, right from your browser.

Zoho Meeting is typically used in the following scenarios. 

You can host secure, robust web meetings and share your screen online with your remote audience using any browser or computer operating system. Your remote audience can be from any part of the world and they can be in different locations. Zoho Meeting saves time, travel and money by providing real-time virtual meetings - While face-to-face meetings are still a necessity and irreplaceable in many circumstances; the power of a Zoho Meeting provides the next best thing. Online meeting is also tightly integrated with Zoho CRM. Now you can schedule, invite, host meetings and view reports and recording from your Zoho CRM account.

You can organize cost-effective sales and marketing meetings with a few simple clicks of your mouse. Demonstrate your products and services to potential clients and even perform after-sales support. Simplify your sales process with online presentations, conduct web meetings for business strategy and marketing; communicate efficiently and quickly with your customers anywhere, anytime.

You can target new prospects or announce new product launches to your existing customer base using Zoho Meeting. Host large virtual events and live stream them on social platform. Webinars and media launches can effectively be managed to save you a bundle in time and money.
product_description: Reach your global customers within minutes and present your product demos or sales presentation. Close deals faster without travelling.Seller DetailsSellerZoho Corporation Pvt. It offers beautifully smart software to help you grow your business. With over 50 million users worldwide, Zoho's 45+ products aid your sales and marketing, support and collaboration, finance and recruitment needs, with the long term vision to transform the way you work. Our Global HQ is in Chennai, India, and the US HQ is in Austin, Texas.MSOverview Provided by:Muthumeena SudalaimuthuSr. Product Marketer

what_is: Shaw Systems offers software that’s stood the test of time - we’ve specialized in loan servicing software since 1967. We offer an integrated servicing solution for loan and lease, as well as collections and recovery management. We are distinguished by the personal service we offer and our dedication to clients. Our software provides automation, flexibility, a user-friendly interface, and a scalable solution to support top financial institutions. Our client base includes auto finance leaders, banks, captive finance companies, credit unions, fintech lenders, wholesale lenders, commercial finance, and specialty lenders.
product_description: No matter what segment of the credit spectrum you serve, our retail system provides the tools to serve your dealers and their borrowers with adaptable loan products.Since 1967 Shaw Systems has led the way in automated loan software with financial software products managing the lending process for businesses. Over 300 clients in eight countries have benefited from using our software. We provide complete solutions for loan and lease servicing in addition to collections and recovery management.Delivering Exceptional Products for Over 40 YearsServing the Largest Banks and Finance CompaniesVast Auto Finance Expertise and CapabilitiesIndustry Leadership with World-Class ProductsExceptional Product Value and Comprehensive SupportDedicated employees give Shaw an edgeA significant portion of our employees have been with the company for more than 10 years, giving Shaw one of the industry’s lowest employee turnover rates. In return, this dedication allows us to give clients consistent and in-depth attention.Seller DetailsSellerShaw Systems Associates, LLCYear Founded1967HQ LocationHouston, TXTwitter@ShawSystems292 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com1 employees on LinkedIn®DescriptionShaw Systems is a leading provider of modern web-based servicing and collections software with over 5 decades of experience. We provide out-of-the-box loan servicing configuration and business rules so your team can hit the ground running. Our pre-configured product allows any size lender to accelerate their project and leverage best practices right away. Our fully integrated solution offers seamless support for the needs of the borrower, dealer/merchant, internal staff, and management. Shaw's solution manages every aspect of the servicing life cycle. This includes the welcome call/email/text, accounting, customer service, delinquency management, recovery, and placement. Financial organizations can obtain business faster and at a lower cost with our industry leading servicing software.ANOverview Provided by:Amanda NashCommunications Specialist at Shaw Systems Associates, LLC.

what_is: Transform your design, modeling, and presentation workflows with Vectorworks Landmark, the industry-leading landscape-focused BIM software solution made specifically for landscape architects and designers. With intelligent objects, powerful databases, and flexible documentation features, Landmark streamlines integrated 2D and 3D landscape-specific BIM workflows all in one application. With enhancements that spark limitless creativity, Vectorworks Landmark 2024 delivers intuitive design tools that enable meaningful participation in the BIM process. These include a more efficient and customizable user interface, a new automated Fence tool, and a dedicated nature-focused color palette. Empowering you to design without limits.
product_description: Vectorworks, Inc. is a global design and BIM software developer serving over 650,000 professionals in the architecture, landscape and entertainment industries. Since 1985, we’ve been committed to helping designers capture inspiration, nurture innovation, communicate effectively and bring their visions to life. With our cross-platform software, designers can build data-rich, visual models without sacrificing the design process, while collaborating efficiently throughout the project life-cycle. Headquartered in Columbia, Maryland, Vectorworks is a part of the Nemetschek Group. Learn how we empower designers to create experiences that transform the worldUnlike other design software, Vectorworks Landmark has the flexibility to support your entire project from beginning to end. It’s the all-in-one solution you need to streamline your process from hand sketching, 2D drafting, and 3D modeling into a single tool to accomplish everything you need. Its BIM landscape automation, vast suite of visualization and presentation tools, plus cutting-edge technologies like virtual and augmented reality make it easy to win more work and impress clients. Vectorworks Landmark offers exceptional collaboration features with support for over two dozen import/export capabilities, and it seamlessly integrates data across all stages of a project, enhancing workflows and enabling limitless design possibilities.Seller DetailsSellerVectorworks, Inc.Company Websitewww.vectorworks.netYear Founded1985HQ LocationColumbia, MarylandTwitter@Vectorworks11,485 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com299 employees on LinkedIn®DescriptionVectorworks, Inc. is a global design and BIM software developer serving over 650,000 professionals in the architecture, landscape and entertainment industries. Since 1985, we’ve been committed to helping designers capture inspiration, nurture innovation, communicate effectively and bring their visions to life. With our cross-platform software, designers can build data-rich, visual models without sacrificing the design process, while collaborating efficiently throughout the project life-cycle. Headquartered in Columbia, Maryland, Vectorworks is a part of the Nemetschek Group. Learn how we empower designers to create experiences that transform the world at vectorworks.net.TFOverview Provided by:Tyler French

what_is:
ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus is an identity security solution with MFA, SSO, and SSPR capabilities.
ADSelfService Plus is an identity security solution that ensures secure and seamless access to enterprise resources and establishes a Zero Trust environment. With adaptive multi-factor authentication (MFA), single sign-on (SSO), self-service password management, a password policy enhancer, remote work enablement, and workforce self-service, ADSelfService Plus provides your employees with secure, simple access to the resources they need. ADSelfService Plus helps keep identity-based threats out, fast-tracks application onboarding, improves password security, reduces help desk tickets, and empowers remote workforces.
The core features of ADSelfService Plus include:
Adaptive MFA
Enable context-based MFA with 19 different authentication factors for endpoint and application logins.
Enterprise SSO
Allow users to access all enterprise applications with a single, secure authentication flow.
Password management and security
Simplify password management with self-service password resets and account unlocks, strong password policies, and password expiry notifications.
Enterprise self-service
Delegate profile updates and group subscriptions to end users and monitor these self-service actions with approval workflows.
Remote work enablement
Enhance remote work with cached credential updates, secure logins, and mobile password management.
Powerful integrations
Establish an efficient and secure IT environment through integration with SIEM, ITSM, and IAM tools.
Reporting and auditing
Simplify auditing with predefined, actionable reports about authentication failures, logon attempts, and blocked users.

what_is:
Xactly Forecasting is designed to remove data silos, easily surface pipeline details and trends, and provide an objective lens into any type of sales forecast via AI. 

GTM, finance, and revenue operations leaders need a unified approach to sales forecasts that are supported by data — both past and present — and are flexible to meet any potential changes to their GTM processes. 

Here are ways Xactly Forecasting helps organizations unlock revenue potential: 
- Formalize forecasting processes to hit your number 
- Increase accuracy with multi-level, AI-augmented forecasts 
- Improve pipeline inspection with dynamic health and confidence scoring 
- Forecast commissions alongside pipeline movement 

To learn more and request a demo, visit https://xact.ly/ugS21
product_description: Sales pipeline predictabilityA forecasting solution should adapt to your business, not confine it.Markets, your business and its goals are always evolving. Why continue to use a tool that doesn’t evolve with you? Xactly Forecasting accelerates your business forward with a single source of truth for consistent sales execution and accurate forecasting to drive sales revenue.Use a sales forecasting solution that adapts to your changing businessSome forecasting platforms are rigid, leaving companies to pursue custom development for future requirements. Xactly Forecasting easily adapts and optimizes your complex sales forecasting processes that include multiple product lines, unique revenue schedules, specific business models and custom objects.Gain accurate commissions alongside your revenue forecastAvoid being blindsided by inaccurate commission data. Commission Earnings Forecasting (CEF) provides the visibility and control needed to calculate anticipated commission expenses alongside your constantly shifting sales pipeline. No other forecasting solution has this power.Seller DetailsSellerXactlyCompany Websitewww.xactlycorp.comPhone408-977-3132Year Founded2005HQ LocationSan Jose, CATotal Revenue (USD mm)$95Twitter@Xactly21,969 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com810 employees on LinkedIn®AAOverview Provided by:Alex Arora

Atriuum is a cloud-based Integrated Library System (ILS) designed to work with any library and is built on over 30 years of library technology and library automation experience. Atriuum provides advanced features such as configurable user interfaces, customizable reports, mobile searching, and eBook resource sharing.

The new Gallery OPAC interface for Atriuum provides a modern, mobile-responsive online catalog for your patrons. Your patrons will immediately notice the "eye-catching" enriched content and appreciate the sleek, modern look and feel.

what_is:
SQmediator is a multi-user performance management system that supports passive quality monitoring and active testing for a variety of IP network services and applications including Voice over IP, IP videoconferencing, web, email, DHCP and DNS. In passive mode, it collects, analyzes and displays performance metrics sent by IP phones, probes and other media endpoints. In active mode, it uses distributed software or hardware test agents to generate simulated VoIP and video conferencing calls and to test network services and applications.

SQmediator Service Provider Edition is a highly scalable multi-server management application that supports multiple services, aggregation for customer locations, and a web services API for integration with back-end applications.   This edition also features multi-tenancy, providing per-location and per-customer dashboards.

SQmediator Enterprise Edition is a scalable multi-server management application for large enterprise, providing aggregation by location, SNMP trap generation and Email alerts.  

SQmediator Business Edition is a cost effective single-server management application for mid-sized enterprise and call centers.

SQmediator Small Business Edition is a low cost single-server management application for single location businesses.

All editions of SQmediator support definition of service quality thresholds, SNMP trap and email alert generation, secure multi-user browser based user interface, advanced interactive dashboards with rapid drill down for troubleshooting individual calls and a range of other features.

Our technology is renowned for its accuracy under real world conditions.Telchemy's probes and management applications are pure software and can be deployed in virtualized data centers, deployed as Linux applications or deployed in the Cloud.Telchemy led development of key IETF and ITU standards related to VoIP and Video performance reporting, was the first to implement these standards and has the largest deployment.Seller DetailsSellerTelchemyHQ LocationDuluth, GALinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com16 employees on LinkedIn®ACOverview Provided by:Alan ClarkCEO of Telchemy

what_is:
Undelete files, unformat partitions and recover corrupted hard drives with easy step-by-step wizards. A single, all-in-one solution will take care of all your disk and data recovery needs. Hetman Partition Recovery can unerase deleted files and folders, recover files from formatted, corrupted, repartitioned and inaccessible storage media. In addition, Hetman Partition Recovery offers a comprehensive set of tools to rebuild damaged volumes and partitions, fix corrupted file systems and restore hard disks back to full operation.

Hetman Partition Recovery combines the functionality of several disk recovery tools in one convenient package. Undelete, unformat, scandisk and partition recovery tools are easily available and can be used by anyone thanks to the many guided, step-by-step wizards available. This hard drive data recovery tool can be used to restore damaged and inaccessible hard drives back into full operation completely automatically.

The hard drive recovery software is designed to be completely safe even in the hands of a computer novice. It opens disk volumes in read-only mode, restoring files and folders onto a different hard drive or burning them onto a CD/DVD media. Alternatively, an ISO image can be created. Recovered information can also be uploaded onto an FTP server.

Hetman Partition Recovery is designed with compatibility in mind. The hard drive recovery tool works with all types of storage media including internal and removable hard disks, USB flash drives and all types of memory cards including as SD, microSD, SDHC/SDXC, CompactFlash, Memory Stick and so on. All 32-bit and 64-bit versions of Windows are supported including Windows 7.

Hetman Partition Recovery recognizes all versions and revisions of FAT and NTFS file systems ever produced. VFAT, FAT16, FAT32, NTFS3, 4, 5, and NTFS6 can be recovered complete with alternative data stream, NTFS-compressed and encrypted volume support.

what_is:
Monitordroid allows users to remotely access and manage multiple Android devices from the web, no matter where they or their devices are. 
With Monitordroid users can remotely send and view SMS messages, download files and photos, or track location history on multiple devices, on top of many other features. We offer special features for enterprises in order to meet their needs.  All of our features are available for unrooted devices, and use very little data or battery. Everything functions whether the device is on a data or WiFi network. 

Ensure compliance and proper device usage
Track devices and push out notifications
Manage files and folders
Can be set up on your own servers for complete control
Custom features for enterprises.
Support multiple devices.
App runs completely in the background
No unwanted data and battery usage. We created our infrastructure with efficiency at the foundation.

what_is: Network Security Task Manager securely protects Windows networks from sophisticated malware not detected by traditional security solutions. Today malware is diverse and numerous. Thousands of potential spyware, Trojans, keyloggers and spybots endanger the safety of your private and business information. The constant development of malware techniques makes traditional signature-based systems quite ineffective in detecting new and emerging threats. The innovative solution by Neuber Software - Network Security Task Manager - is an must-have for proper Windows network protection. Network Security Task Manager is based on behavior and code analysis. It protects Windows networks from industrial espionage, sabotage and security-critical software, informing you about active malware on networked computers in real time mode. This compact and fast tool analyzes Windows processes running on networked computers and shows a unique security risk rating for each process. Besides, Network Security Task Manager displays full directory path and file name of a certain process, its description and manufacturer, computers the process runs on and embedded hidden functions, such as keyboard monitoring or browser supervision. It should be noted that Network Security Task Manager stands out from other behavior-based programs. Apart from providing an easy overview about running processes on networked computers it has some major advantages over similar tools. Network Security Task Manager needs no installation, no setup, and no updates. The user license is unlimited, and after a single payment no additional subscription fees are imposed. The price is reasonable and depends on the number of computers that are monitored. The price of unlimited user license depends on the number of computers monitored, e.g. 20 USD per client for 5 clients or 8 USD per client for 100 clients. See more details on http://www.neuber.com/network-taskmanager/

what_is: Sellbrite enables brands & retailers to list and sell products effortlessly across multiple online sales channels and gain centralized control over inventory and orders. what_is:
Yext helps organizations answer every question about their business.

Yext's Answers Platform collects and organizes content into a Knowledge Graph, then leverages a complementary set of products — including Listings, Pages, Reviews, and Search — to deliver relevant, actionable answers wherever customers, employees, and partners look for information.

For over 15 years, thousands of companies worldwide have trusted Yext to create seamless content-driven experiences at scale across search engines, websites, mobile apps, and hundreds of other digital touchpoints. Learn more at yext.com.
product_description: Yext is an API-first, composable software platform that collects and organizes content from across the enterprise to deliver relevant, actionable information — in the form of answers — wherever people ask questions about a business.For more than 15 years Yext has innovated to build components of the Answers Platform.Over time, we’ve steadily introduced complementary products and pieces of functionality to help businesses deliver answers across a wide variety of first and third-party digital touchpoints. We’re not planning to slow down anytime soon. With three seasonal releases each year, 200+ engineers, and 30+ data scientists, our award-winning R&D team is continuously perfecting our platform to help businesses create, manage, and optimize the world’s best content-driven digital experiences.Seller DetailsSellerYextOwnershipNYSE: YEXTCompany Websitewww.yext.comYear Founded2006HQ LocationNew YorkTwitter@yext22,746 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com2,070 employees on LinkedIn®GKOverview Provided by:Gordon KnappSenior Marketing Strategist

We’re not planning to slow down anytime soon. what_is:
Mapbox is the live location platform preferred by over 4 million developers. Mapbox provides precise location data and flexible developer tools that equip any business to add geospatial features to their applications and enhance operations with location intelligence. Customers span automotive, logistics, business intelligence, retail, travel, data visualization, consumer apps, weather, IoT, geospatial analysis, and beyond.

With the leading map rendering technology for web and mobile, Mapbox is known for providing highly performant, customizable, reliable, and scalable location services trusted by developers, companies, and business leaders. Mapbox services include global map data, real-time traffic, geocoding and address search, and routing and directions for navigation. Build with Mapbox via APIs, code libraries, SDKs, and comprehensive developer documentation. Designed for businesses of all sizes, Mapbox is free to start building with and pricing is based on monthly usage, no upfront licenses or contracts required.

Mapbox is a global team of 700+ with offices in Washington D.C., Helsinki, and Tokyo. Mapbox was founded in 2010. Today, Mapbox powers the location intelligence of platforms, apps, and brands around the world.
product_description: Mapbox is the location data platform for developers to build custom geospatial features into mobile, web, and on-premise applications. Mapbox powers navigation for people, deliveries, and vehicles everywhere.Seller DetailsSellerMapboxYear Founded2010HQ LocationWashington D.C.Twitter@Mapbox76,862 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com704 employees on LinkedIn®MSOverview Provided by:Marena Smith

pricing_plans:
Name: Mapbox GL JS for web maps
Price: Pay As You Go
Per Month
Description: Mapbox GL JS is a JavaScript library for vector maps on the Web. Its performance, real-time styling, and interactivity features set the bar for anyone building fast, immersive maps on the web. A map load occurs whenever a Map object is initialized, offering users unlimited interactivity with your web map.
Features:
- See the complete pricing guide at mapbox.com/pricing
- A map load is counted every time Mapbox GL JS initializes on a webpage or in a web app.
- A map load includes unlimited Vector Tiles API and Raster Tiles API requests.
- Mapbox can also offer metering and billing of Mapbox APIs by seats.

Name: Maps SDKs for Mobile
Price: Pay As You Go
Per Month
Description: Get the most compelling map experiences available on iOS and Android. The Maps SDK v10 brings new capabilities, performance improvements, and a modern developer experience.
Features:
- See the complete pricing guide at mapbox.com/pricing
- A Monthly Active User is a user of your app who uses Mapbox services within your web application during your month-long billing period.
- Each user may make unlimited Vector Tiles API and Raster Tiles API requests.
- For volume discounts or enterprise agreements, please contact the Mapbox Sales team

Name: Navigation SDK
Price: Pay As You Go
Per Month
Description: Embed navigation with routing and guidance directly into your app. (Navigation SDK v2 and higher.)
Features:
- Metered trips pricing option: Pay only for trips your users take.
- Unlimited trips pricing option: Pay a flat fee for each user regardless of their usage.
- See full pricing and free thresholds at mapbox.com/pricing

Name: Mapbox Search
Price: Pay As You Go
Per Month
Description: Turn coordinates into addresses or addresses into coordinates.
Features:
- Temporary Geocoding API: Find places, addresses, or points of interest by address, name, or with geographic coordinates.
- Permanent Geocoding API: Permanently store forward and reverse search results, make batch geocoding requests, or both.
- Address Autofill: Automatically separate address components to quickly fill out a form.
- For full pricing details see mapbox.com/pricing

Name: Other Mapbox APIs, Tileset hosting, and Data products
Price: Pay As You Go
Per Month
Description: Find additional information on all available Mapbox APIs, tileset processing and hosting, and data products.
Features:
- mapbox.com/pricing
- If you have questions, please contact the Mapbox Sales team.

Name: Mapbox Support plans
Price: Starting at $50.00
Per Month
Description: If you are looking for a little extra technical support from Mapbox, please consider our paid support plans.
Features:
- mapbox.com/pricing#support
- Guaranteed email support response times
- Guidance on proper API syntax
- Business: Technical best practices, tailored for your use case
- Premium: Support offerings for strategic partnerships

Greetly's digital receptionist app saves valuable time and dollars by modernizing customer’s office receptionist capabilities by managing their visiting customers, vendors and interview candidates, as well as package and food deliveries, facility tours, secured facility entry/exit and more. what_is:
Applied Epic® is an agency management platform that allows you to manage your business across all roles and locations for both your P&C and Benefits books of business. Applied Epic provides a single view of the customer with automated capabilities for each stakeholder in your agency while also supporting integrations and making acquisitions easy using its open and scalable architecture.

Applied Epic Helps Your Business Grow:  

Embrace technology with an open and flexible platform. Applied Epic® makes bringing on acquired agencies easy and delivers reliable integrations between Applied and third-party applications to guarantee productivity and profitability as your business needs change.

Give your P&C and Benefits brokers a single place to operate. All roles, locations, and lines of business – both P&C and Benefits – can be managed in Applied Epic while giving flexibility for staff to operate with other applications that exchange data directly with Applied Epic.

Empower your team to work from anywhere in a system they'll love. In just a few clicks, agency staff can view account and policy details, complete a quote, file a claim, and remarket a renewal, all while on the go. 

Work better with your insurer partners. Connect with insurer partners from your daily workflow to save time servicing customers. Without leaving your core system, you can find the best products quickly and easily and exchange policy details with both Personal and Commercial Lines rating capabilities.

Meet your customers wherever they are. With the ability to seamlessly integrate with your online client portal and mobile app, you can help customers help themselves through 24/7 access to the policy information in your management system. 

Streamline your payments processes. Give your clients a superior payment experience with the insurance industry’s most versatile digital payments platform.
product_description: Applied Epic enables agencies to manage their property and casualty and benefits business in a single application.With 40 years of experience, 2,500 team members, and 160,000 users in four operating regions, Applied is the global leader among agency management system providers. Our people have walked in agents' shoes and understand what you need to be successful. Applied technologists marry this domain expertise with world-class technology innovation that speaks your language.Our team of software experts and former insurance agents who have walked in your shoes are here to provide services, support and education, and training each step of the way.•	97% of customers are satisfied with Applied Support services.•	24/7 constant monitoring and performance of first-level problem resolution.•	18-second average wait time to chat online with an Applied Support Specialist.•	883 years of collective insurance industry training and software expertise of Applied Support Managers.•	50+ support-led product webinars presented to nearly 6,000 users in the last year.Seller DetailsSellerApplied SystemsCompany Websitewww.appliedsystems.comYear Founded1983HQ LocationUniversity Park, ILTwitter@AppliedSystems7,168 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com2,407 employees on LinkedIn®DescriptionWe can help everyone at your agency transform to make the day-to-day more efficient and extend the traditional storefront to online insurance experiences.KPOverview Provided by:Kelly Powell

GBSI is headquartered in Moline, Illinois  with  consultants empowering our clients across the United States, Canada, India & Europe for more than  20 years. World's top organizations in manufacturing, automotive, life sciences, oil & gas, food & beverages  industry segments  trust us  to leverage our industry best practices experience and cross- pollination insights to avoid expensive IT pitfalls  in  their Enterprise IT solutions. 
GBSI is a certified SAP (ERP), UI Path (Robotic Process Automation -RPA)  and AWS partner  featured in multiple top publications including CNBC, Fox News, Digital Journal & MarketWatch.

GBSI’s Accelerated IT Services:
Unleashing the full potential of Enterprise IT.


- Global IT ERP Solutions
GBSI SAP S/4 HANA readiness: We offer comprehensive SAP S/4 HANA consulting and support services, including implementation planning, system configuration, data migration, and ongoing guidance, to help Program Managers and IT directors maximize the value of SAP S/4 HANA and drive innovation, efficiency, and growth within their organizations.
GBSI SAP EWM Prospectrum: Our market differentiating offering based on decades of Warehousing experience. We offer comprehensive SAP EWM consulting and support services tailored to the specific needs of SAP clients. Our team of experts collaborates closely with them to identify areas for improvement, provide technical expertise, and implement solutions that stabilize and enhance their SAP EWM implementation, resulting in increased efficiency, accuracy, and overall warehouse management effectiveness 
GBSI Accelerated RF Automation, Track & Trace Blueprint: Our  most advanced, market tested, 6 step framework used by Fortune 500 SAP warehouses to unleash the power of RF and increase  process efficiency, reduce personnel errors, track serialized containers and dramatically boost warehouse agility. 

GBSI  Tech Hub – Our market differentiating proprietary  Development and Technical services 
Cloud based application Development
AI/ML/NLP based application development
Test Automation and Robotic Process Automation (RPA)
GBSI ResolveIT :  Our proprietary  cutting edge Enterprise Application Maintenance Services (AMS) focusing on the 4 pillars  of  Corrective, Adaptive, Preventive and Perfective maintenance that  accelerates innovation
GBSI TalentNexus: On-Demand  specialized IT Staff Augmentation services

what_is:
"BitRaser Drive Eraser is a certified data-wiping software that helps you permanently erase data from HDD and SSD in PC, Laptop, Mac, and Server with a 100% guaranteed erasure. The software supports more than 24 international data wiping standards like NIST 800-88 Clear, NIST Purge, DoD 5220.22, etc. Many global bodies like NIST, DHS, ADISA, NYCE, etc. have certified, tested, and approved the tool for its data-wiping efficacy. 
 
The software generates tamper-proof audit-ready report & certificate of data erasure that helps in meeting regulatory compliance with EU-GDPR, CCPA-California, PCI-DSS, SOX, GLBA, DPDP-India, and many more. The tool comes in multiple variants catering to the different needs of customers looking to wipe data at internet-enabled and offline locations. Large enterprises looking to wipe thousands of drives simultaneously can use the 'Network variant' of the drive wiping software that supports 65000 drives simultaneously, to gain scalability in their operations. 
 
BitRaser supports API integration with IT Asset management tools. Furthermore, it supports cloud integration that helps in managing reports and certification.

what_is:
Bright Inventions is a software consulting studio based in Gdansk, Poland operating since 2012. Our expertise in mobile, web, blockchain and IOT systems has been highly appreciated by our clients from UK, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Israel and more.

With over 70 software development specialists on board, we enjoy helping our customers throughout all of the software delivery phases: from the ideation, through requirements elicitation, graphic design, project management, software development, quality assurance and maintenance.

Many times projects that we work on grow eventually into big, highly successful ventures on both technical and business side.

We lead our work with close engagement of our customers and full transparency. Taking advantage of close distance to our partners we mix remote work with as much on site collaboration as possible. When the right time comes it’s natural for us to help our customers grow their own development team who will take over the further evolution of the product.

Our usual clients are consultancy agencies, startups and mid-size organisations on their way to digital transformation.

For the past 25 years, its employees have been inspired to protect individuals, families, businesses and governments as they look to harness the potential of emerging technologies and new ways of sharing information.In today’s organizations, information has become the most strategic asset, embodying competitive advantage and powering operational excellence. With the explosion of mobile, social and cloud technologies, protecting this information has become more challenging than ever. Organizations need a smart protection strategy.Trend Micro enables the smart protection of information, with innovative security solutions that are simple to deploy and manage, and fits an evolving ecosystem. Trend Micro solutions provide layered content security for mobile devices, endpoints, gateways, servers and the cloud. Leveraging these solutions, organizations can protect their end users, their evolving data center and cloud resources, and their information threatened by sophisticated targeted attacks.

Businesses of all sizes use our advanced AI to automate and optimize the curation and distribution of their content. Today, more than 2000 companies in 100 countries, including some of the world's most prestigious brands, rely on our automation to increase performance while saving costs on social media and email newsletters. 

With Echobox you have your own custom AI solution that continuously learns from your content and data. By ensuring you share your best content in the right format at the optimal time, Echobox grows your audience and increases productivity.

Speed up your workflow by using AI to automate some or all of your social media publishing and email newsletter management. Trained off 245 million data points, Echobox’s sophisticated algorithms drive reach and unlock time savings.

ECHOBOX SOCIAL
 ✓ Mitigate Facebook algorithm changes. Echobox constantly monitors changes to Facebook’s Newsfeed so our users are the least affected
 ✓ Unique to your audience. Every audience is different, so Echobox learns from your content, your readers and your social pages so it is uniquely powerful
 ✓ Perfect timing decisions. Echobox has an unrivalled understanding of Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and LinkedIn - based on millions of posts made every month
 ✓ Night-time and weekend posting. Schedule posting at optimal times over weekends and nights or have Echobox select and post content automatically
 ✓ A/B Testing. Get to know your audience even better. Test two variations of the same post to increase CTR by an average of 20%

ECHOBOX EMAIL
✓ Generate perfect emails and newsletters in seconds, fully optimized to increase open rates and click rates
✓ Save countless hours and remove the guesswork from designing and building your  emails and newsletters
✓ Content personalization: Echobox builds a granular understanding of every single subscriber. Content is then selected using deep learning for each of your subscribers' interests, thus increasing subscriber retention and click rate.
✓ Template A/B testing: Echobox makes continuous small adjustments to your template's layout and runs resource-intensive multivariate tests of each variation. Over time, your template converges to its highest-performing layout. This increases your click rate.
✓ Timing personalization: Echobox tracks when each subscriber views their emails. Over time, Echobox accurately personalizes send times. Each subscriber will receive emails at times when they're most likely to open their inbox. This increases your click rate.
✓ Smart content order: Echobox uses cutting-edge machine learning mechanisms to optimally order your content and keep your subscribers more engaged. This increases your click rate.

Learn more about Echobox and our customers, including Newsweek, CNBC, The Guardian, The Telegraph, Scientific American, Hearst and more at www.echobox.com.

With Crunchr, you can easily access a wealth of information about your employees, including key metrics like turnover rates, pay equality, and more. Crunchr's built-in data lake consolidates data from multiple systems into one clean, easy-to-use platform, making it easy to gain insights and make data-driven decisions about your talent management strategy. Whether you're looking to reduce turnover, improve employee satisfaction, or simply better understand your workforce, Crunchr is the solution you need.

what_is:
HeadSpin is the world’s first Digital Experience AI Platform that combines cloud-hosted and on-prem global device infrastructure, test automation, and ML-driven performance & quality of experience analytics for mobile, web, audio, and video. HeadSpin empowers engineering, QA, operations, and product teams to assure optimal digital experiences across delivery channels throughout the development lifecycle. Learn more at www.HeadSpin.io .

Global Device Infrastructure
Allows end-to-end testing & monitoring with thousands of devices in hundreds of locations on real carrier and WiFi networks around the globe. No SDK required.

Test Automation & APIs
Integrates seamlessly into CI/CD workflows enabling functional and performance testing pre and post release. Support for all testing frameworks.

Performance, QoE & Machine Learning
Automatically surfaces issues and points to underlying root causes across all layers of the stack—from quantifying audio/video QoE to code and packet visibility.

Insights-to-Actions
Delivers regression and aggregation insights throughout the digital experience lifecycle, from planning and development to troubleticketing and operations. Trending, alerts, and analytics.
product_description: HeadSpin is a global omnichannel digital experience testing platform that helps enterprises optimize application performance with its data science capabilities. With a strong infrastructure availability of real devices across 90+ locations, the HeadSpin Platform enables manual and automated app testing with a wide range of devices, including both screen and screenless devices, such as mobile phones, desktop browsers, media players, audio devices, and even automotive systems. The Platform has an extensive on-prem and cloud-hosted device infrastructure that uses data science-driven performance and quality of experience analytics to collect over 100+ performance experience KPIs out of the box and provide performance analysis and monitoring across the engineering cycle. The Platform's advanced capabilities enable leading global enterprises to achieve an improved digital experience, faster triage, and cost efficiency.While there is a slight overlap with a number of other tools, HeadSpin’s combination of automation, AI and analytics for end-to-end testing, performance optimization and experience monitoring is unique in the marketplace.*HeadSpin Advantages over Similar Solutions*- AI-powered user QoE metrics and recommendation engine for performance optimization- Bare-metal dedicated device access—no SDK or simulations- Open data architecture and support for any test API/frameworkSeller DetailsSellerHeadSpinYear Founded2015HQ LocationSunnyvale, CaliforniaTwitter@headspin_io1,589 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com240 employees on LinkedIn®SCOverview Provided by:Sharon Chu

what_is:
DataTracks is a well-known global leader that offers clients all over the world financial reporting solutions. DataTracks provides a wide range of services and solutions focused at optimizing the financial reporting process, with a strong presence in important regions including the USA, United Kingdom, Ireland, Europe, South Africa, Singapore, India, and Malaysia.
 
They provide automated compliance and regulatory report preparation in HTML, XBRL, and iXBRL formats through their cloud-based solutions. DataTracks easily harvests data from systems using cutting-edge technology, enabling the automation of report development. Their teamwork method makes sure that narratives are developed with the help of stakeholders, guaranteeing correctness and comprehensiveness.

With 18 years in the business, DataTracks has established a solid name and a loyal customer. They provide services in 26 countries, have served over 23,400 clients, and have generated an astounding 348,000 reports. Their track record demonstrates their knowledge, dependability, and dedication to financial reporting excellence. 

Whether you run a small business or a large organization, DataTracks has solutions that are specifically designed to match your specific reporting requirements. They are a top option for companies looking for effective and legal financial reporting solutions due to their wide worldwide reach and cutting-edge technology.
 
Select DataTracks to benefit from the innovation, automation, and unrivaled knowledge that can streamline your financial reporting process. 
 
Let's see how DataTracks provides support for each of these areas: 
 
USA

DataTracks offers services and a software solution called "DataTracks Rainbow" to help companies meet SEC regulations for a variety of forms, including 10K, 10Q, 8K, 20F, 40F, 485BPOS, 497, 497K, S1 (registration statements for corporates), and N-1A (registration statements for mutual funds). The tagging procedure makes use of the most recent XBRL taxonomy that has been certified by the SEC, assuring proper conversion to XBRL or iXBRL.
 
With their flagship product, "Glacier," which is based on the Data Point Model (DPM), DataTracks also satisfies FERC (Federal Energy Regulatory Commission) reporting standards. Glacier has expanded to meet FERC reporting requirements after initially being popular among insurance businesses and financial institutions in the European Union for XBRL regulatory compliance reports. The Data Act and FTA are two additional rules that apply to USA areas. 
 
United Kingdom 
 
iXBRL Tagging Services are provided by DataTracks to meet UK HMRC compliance needs. To ensure accurate and effective reporting, they specialize in painstakingly labeling financial statements, tax calculations, and other pertinent financial data. 
 
Additionally, DataTracks offers CT600 filing services, expediting the process and guaranteeing accurate CT600 form creation and submission to HMRC. Additionally, they provide Making Tax Digital (MTD) for VAT bridging software, which streamlines the filing of VAT returns and guarantees adherence to MTD rules. 
 
Ireland: 
 
DataTracks offers complete solutions for compliance with Irish Revenue requirements to businesses in Ireland. They provide conformance to Irish reporting rules by facilitating accurate and effective translation of financial statements into iXBRL format. 
 
Europe: 
 
DataTracks complies with a variety of standards in Europe as a premier supplier of all-inclusive solutions for financial reporting and regulatory compliance. ESEF reporting, AIFMD reporting, CRD IV reporting, Solvency II reporting, MiFID II reporting, and ESG reporting are among the services they provide. 
 
South Africa: 
 
iXBRL software and services are provided by DataTracks to assist qualified businesses in creating compliance reports for CIPC filing. For in-house iXBRL report preparation and filing, they provide iXBRL conversion and tagging services as well as a cloud-based iXBRL software solution. 
 
Singapore: 
 
In Singapore, DataTracks provides XBRL tagging services for ACRA filing. They help businesses transform their financial statements into the XBRL format that ACRA mandates for all Singapore-incorporated businesses. Companies can get assistance from DataTracks' team of knowledgeable XBRL specialists in meeting ACRA's filing requirements. 
 
India: 
 
In India, DataTracks assists businesses in adhering to the demanding standards set by the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA). They provide managed tagging and XBRL conversion services, enabling the conversion of financial statements from several formats into XBRL and guaranteeing MCA compliance. 
 
Malaysia: 
 
Companies in Malaysia can use DataTracks' assistance to create XBRL reports that adhere to the reporting requirements established by the Companies Commission of Malaysia (SSM). Their XBRL preparation and tagging services guarantee precise, error-free, and effective compliance. 
 
Global: 
 
Country-by-Country Reporting (CbCR) software and services are available from DataTracks in their entirety. They are experts in creating CbCR XML reports for submission to more than 20 international tax agencies. 
 
Additionally, DataTracks offers professional FATCA reporting services, such as data collection, form preparation, XML filing with more than 20 tax authorities, and assuring IRS compliance. They provide a quick and secure reporting procedure, letting companies concentrate on what they do best. 
 
Visit https://www.datatracks.com/ to discover more about DataTracks and their services.
product_description: DataTracks enables customers across geographies to file reports compliant with the standards of regulators like the SEC (the US), HMRC (the UK), Revenue (Ireland), various EU regulatory authorities, ACRA (Singapore), MCA (India), and CIPC (South Africa). To know why financial accounting firms and enterprises world-over trust DataTracks, please visit https://www.datatracks.com, https://www.datatracks.co.uk, and https://www.datatracks.eu.Seller DetailsSellerDataTracksCompany Websitewww.datatracks.comPhone1800-937-9280 & +44-20-3608 1300Year Founded2005HQ LocationSingapore, SingaporeTwitter@DataTracks2,996 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com453 employees on LinkedIn®SHOverview Provided by:Shabeer  HussainMarketing

what_is:
Axonator is a world-class zero-code mobile app builder used for data collection, complex workflow automation, report generation, advanced analytics, and integration with third-party or legacy systems. Anyone, without the knowledge of coding, can build enterprise-grade mobile apps on Axonator. Its drag & drop interface and widgets offer seamless ways to create mobile apps that drive efficiency and promote digitalization with maximum ROI.

Axonator low-code platform empowers companies to:

Replace paper-based processes with digital mobile apps
Increase employee productivity through smart workflows 
Overcome manual, repetitive, & erroneous processes
Accelerate digital transformation
Streamline and enhance existing/legacy systems
Save time on data collection & report generation
Feature Components of Axonator Low-code Platform
The platform’s prebuilt components include a form builder, workflow builder, report & dashboard builder, and integrator & connectors that accelerate mobile application development and extend the ability to a broader set of people.
Form Builder
The robust mobile form builder empowers companies to create customized mobile forms to suit specific requirements using the drag and drop interface. Firms can easily create mobile forms from scratch with advanced capabilities to transform the way they collect the most crucial data.
Workflow Builder
Axonator Workflow Builder allows companies to build powerful mobile workflows with a drag and drop functionality with minimal coding for customization. The platform’s mobile-first approach to the automation of workflows makes it easy for organizations to connect their field workforces with office staff members.
Report & Dashboard Builder
Axonator report builder helps empower to track, monitor, and analyze every task through digital reporting to enable continuous learning and informed decision making. It also brings all the important reports together to create meaningful dashboards and gain a complete view of your business.
Integrator & Connectors
Axonator business mobile apps have built-in support for numerous third-party software. Fast and easy integration eliminates data silos and brings different systems together seamlessly.

what_is: TetGen is a program to generate tetrahedral meshes of any 3D polyhedral domains. TetGen generates exact constrained Delaunay tetrahedralizations, boundary conforming Delaunay meshes, and Voronoi partitions. The following pictures respectively illustrate a 3D polyhedral domain (left), a boundary conforming Delaunay tetrahedral mesh (middle), and its dual - a Voronoi partition (right).

what_is:
Hevo is a zero-maintenance data pipeline platform that automatically syncs data from over 150 data sources, including SQL, NoSQL, and SaaS applications, to your warehouse and transforms it for analytics - freeing data teams from the manual burden of managing pipelines. 

Trusted by over 2500 data teams across more than 40 countries, Hevo empowers businesses to integrate all their data into a centralized warehouse. Our platform offers a simple and intuitive interface, making the setup of data pipelines a breeze. In just four easy steps and within five minutes, you can have your data moving smoothly.

what_is:
Ansys HFSS is a 3D electromagnetic (EM) simulation software for designing and simulating high-frequency electronic products such as antennas, antenna arrays, RF or microwave components, high-speed interconnects, filters, connectors, IC packages and printed circuit boards. Engineers worldwide use Ansys HFSS software to design high-frequency, high-speed electronics found in communications systems, advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS), satellites, and internet-of-things (IoT) products .

HFFS’s unmatched capacity, coupled with indisputable accuracy, enables engineers to address RF, microwave, IC, PCB and EMI problems for most complex systems. Quick specs include: 
 - Antenna Design Toolkit
 - Radar Pre/Post Processing
 - Frequency and Time Domain FEM 
 - Hybrid FEM/IE/SBR+ Solver
 - 3D Layout ECAD Flow
 - SBR+ Accelerated Doppler Processing*
 - Integral Equation (MoM)
 - Memory Matrix Solvers
 - 5G Post-Processing
 - Concurrent Initial 3D Meshing 
 - SBR+ for Large Scale EMs
 - Multiplication Solver

* available only with Electronics Enterprise package
product_description: ANSYS HFSS software is the industry standard for simulating high-frequency electromagnetic fields. Its gold-standard accuracy, advanced solvers and high-performance computing technologies make it an essential tool for engineers tasked with executing accurate and rapid design in high-frequency and high-speed electronic devices and platforms. HFSS offers state-of the-art solver technologies based on finite element, integral equation, asymptotic and advanced hybrid methods to solve a wide range of microwave, RF and high-speed digital applications.Seller DetailsSellerAnsys, Inc.OwnershipNASDAQ:ANSSYear Founded1970HQ LocationCanonsburg, PATotal Revenue (USD mm)$1,681Twitter@ANSYS29,126 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com7,618 employees on LinkedIn®MBOverview Provided by:Marion BLANC

what_is:
iubenda is a pioneering legal compliance software and Consent Management Platform (CMP).

Trusted by over 100,000 customers in 100+ countries, iubenda’s 360-degree solution helps businesses and individuals make their sites and apps compliant with privacy laws such as Europe’s GDPR (incl. UK GDPR) and ePrivacy/Cookie Law, Switzerland’s FADP, United States’ CCPA as amended by the CPRA and several other US State Laws, and Brazil’s LGPD

Easily generate legally compliant documents (Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy, and Terms and Conditions) in up to 12 languages, and collect your users’ consent preferences via a cookie banner or a consent banner/privacy controls.

With iubenda, you can enjoy full customization options, seamless integration, and a powerful site scanner that can quickly identify any areas where you fall short of a 100% compliance rating. The site scanner also provides helpful guidance on how to achieve compliance, making it an invaluable tool for anyone seeking to stay on top of privacy regulations.

Our solutions are powered by an international team of lawyers — so you can leave all the hard legal work to us while you focus on growing your business! Our legal team automatically updates your documents when there are changes in laws, helping you stay compliant with the latest regulations.

It is a Document Management System that helps in storing, tracking, retrieving and managing documents while having centralized access. Anyone and everyone with permission can access a file irrespective of where they are. what_is:
Bottleneck Distant Assistants' unique selling proposition is its commitment to supporting clients who are doing the wrong things so they can focus on their best work.

The company recognizes that many individuals and businesses today are struggling to keep up with the demands of a fast-paced and ever-changing world, and are often bogged down by unproductive and time-consuming tasks that prevent them from focusing on what really matters.

To address this challenge, Bottleneck offers a suite of services designed to relieve clients of unproductive tasks and help them optimize their productivity and achieve their goals.

These services are delivered by a team of highly skilled and experienced human distant assistants, different from virtual assistants, who are trained to identify areas where clients can improve their workflows, streamline their processes, and outsource tasks that are not core to their business.

Bottleneck also takes a highly personalized approach to service, working closely with clients to understand their unique needs and goals and offering tailored solutions that meet their specific requirements. This enables clients to work more efficiently, achieve greater results, and focus on the tasks that matter most to their success.

By providing this unique value proposition, Bottleneck has established itself as a leader in the distant assistant industry and differentiated itself from traditional virtual assistant services. The company's commitment to excellence, innovation, and exceptional service has earned it a loyal and growing base of clients who trust Bottleneck to help them achieve their fullest potential.

Want to know more about us? Let's Talk!
https://bottleneck.online/lets-talk/

Entrust Identity Enterprise is an integrated IAM platform that supports a full suite of workforce, consumer, and citizen use cases. Ideally suited for high-assurance applications that require a Zero Trust approach for thousands or millions of users, Identity Enterprise can be deployed on-premises.

Entrust Identity Enterprise enables: 
•	Credential-based access 
•	Third-party CA support 
•	Smart card and token issuance 
•	Best-in-class MFA 
•	Access to cloud applications 
•	Passwordless login 
•	Identity proofing 
•	Digital citizen identity issuance 
•	Secure portals

what_is:
Meet the full-stack platform for web scraping, data extraction, and automation. Built by developers for developers.

+ Apify Store
Over 1,600 pre-built scrapers for web scraping or automation projects. Scrape social media, Google Maps, Google Search, YouTube, and more.

+ Develop with open-source tools
Simplify scraping with Crawlee, our popular open-source library for building reliable scrapers in Node.js. Or use the new Apify Python SDK.

+ Rely on your favorite libraries
Apify works great with both Python and JavaScript. Use Scrapy, Selenium, Playwright or Puppeteer.

+ Turn your code into an Apify Actor
Actors are serverless microapps that are easy to develop, run, share, and integrate. The infrastructure, proxies, and storages are ready to go.

+ Deploy to the cloud
No configuration required. Use a single CLI command or build directly from GitHub. 

+ Run your Actors
Start from Apify Console, CLI, via API, or schedule your actor to start at any time.

+ Never get blocked
Use our large pool of datacenter and residential proxies. Rely on smart IP address rotation with human-like browser fingerprints.

+ Store and share crawling results
Use distributed queues of URLs to crawl. Store structured data or binary files. Export datasets in Excel, CSV, JSON, JSONL, XML, RSS, or HTML table.

+ Monitor performance over time
Inspect all Actor runs, their logs, and runtime costs. Listen to events and get custom automated alerts.

+ Plug your Actors into any workflow
Connect to hundreds of apps right away using ready-made integrations, or set up your own with webhooks and our API.

+ Publish your Actors
Join hundreds of developers who share their Actors on Apify Store and earn money.
product_description: Apify is a web scraping and automation platform and turn websites into an API.Apify has a strong unique value proposition in both web scraping and automation, thanks to our powerful cloud-based platform.Fast turnaround for complex projectsThe combination of the flexibility of the Apify platform, the number of pre-existing actors in Apify Store, and our open-source tooling, enable Apify developers to deliver solutions for even more complicated projects to customers faster than our competitors.Open-source tools mean no vendor lock-inAll our solutions are based on our open-source libraries and Apify SDK, which gives customers the peace of mind that they will not be vendor-locked, as they can always move their solutions outside of the Apify platform.Seller DetailsSellerApifyYear Founded2015HQ LocationPraha, Hlavni mesto PrahaTwitter@apify2,410 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com88 employees on LinkedIn®OLOverview Provided by:Oliver  Lompart

what_is:
IT Consultants from CenturyLink leverage their proven methodologies and experience to help modernize, optimize and standardize your IT ecosystem for efficiently and securely supporting the needs of your business.​

CenturyLink® IT Consulting experts provides a set of practices to help you address your emerging needs as well as those that plague your existing performance. IT Consultants from CenturyLink will leverage their proven methodologies and experience to help modernize, optimize, standardize your IT ecosystem for efficiently and securely supporting the needs of your business.​
• Network Discovery and Assessment – This offering discovers and assesses the enterprise IP Network and provides future state recommendations based on stated business objectives and tool based data collection and analysis. The focus is on strategic design improvements that could allow the system to more reliably achieve organizational goals. ​
• Network Modernization and Optimization – The offering looks to provide a consolidations of network elements and technology (vendor’s). Focus on standardizing network configurations and processes, providing bandwidth and capacity where needed and in-line with growth and existing programs.​
​• Disaster Recovery Planning – The process centric offering looks to provide classic Disaster Recovery planning with the development of strategies based on company requirements, tactical implementation of well defined processes, and testing considerations from Table Top to Mock DR drills. ​
• Cloud Readiness Assessment – Assist with the alignment of business goals and the development of a Cloud strategy. Analysis, recommendations, roadmaps, risk and reward are all part of the focus with the Journey to the Cloud which also considers the merging of Business Continuance and Disaster Recovery considerations.​
• Datacenter Baseline Assessment – This work package is phase 1 discovery and assessment needed for all data center consulting engagements. Inventory and Life cycle reporting, dependency mappings, risk, issues and gap analysis all lead to the delivery of a solid baseline from which multiple opportunities can launch. ​
• Datacenter Optimization – This work package is designed to identify optimal benefits that can be realized with the least amount of effort. Process specific action plans for stabilization of chronic issues, guidelines for monitoring, correlation and surveillance are key. The focus on optimization with right size the environment introduce controls, processes and next steps on the maturity life cycle. ​

    Content: Hosting providers outline the amount of data that you and your visitors are able to cumulatively upload and download over a given period of time. Pay for additional bandwidth as needed to accomodate web traffic. 10 reviewers of DanDomain have provided feedback on this feature.

    Based On Number Of Reviews: 10

    Name: Email Hosting
    Content: Based on 10 DanDomain reviews. Manage email accounts associated with web domains through a built-in or third-party email interface. Support is provided for POP3 and IMAP email systems.

    Based On Number Of Reviews: 10

what_is:
Entrust Identity as a Service is a cloud-based identity and access management (IAM) solution with multi-factor authentication (MFA), credential-based passwordless access, and single sign-on (SSO).

Entrust Identity as a Service secures access to devices, applications, and resources with an analyst top-rated identity solution that has been proven across critical banking, government and healthcare infrastructures for more than 25 years.

Point-and-click provisioning and out-of-the-box integrations with a variety of on-premises and cloud applications make Entrust Identity as a Service easy to deploy, so you can be up and running in under 30 minutes.

Features include:
• User self service - password reset, authenticators
• VPN remote access
• SSO portal
• AD sync
• Office 365 (SAML integration)
• Additional SAML applications (e.g. SDFC, WebEx)
• Mobile soft token and push notifications
• SMS/Email OTP, KBA, Google Auth, FIDO2, Grid
• Native device biometrics
• Email, web & telephone support: Mon-Fri 8am-8pm EST
• Adaptive/risk-based policy engine
• System for Cross-Domain Identity Management (SCIM)
• Desktop login (via Desktop Agent)
• On-prem application integrations (OAM, Netsuite, IIS)
• Azure Active Directory (AD) sync
• OpenID Connect applications integration
• Azure AD CAC
• SIEM integration (Splunk)
• Auth API (Custom web / mobile apps)
• Admin API (users / groups / policies)
• Cross-platform facial biometrics
• LDAP database sync
• OAuth 2.0 URL/API protection
• Mobile smart credential/bluetooth login
product_description: Entrust Identity as a Service is a cloud-based identity and access management (IAM) solution with multi-factor authentication (MFA), credential-based passwordless access, and single sign-on (SSO) capabilities. With Entrust Identity as a Service, you can quickly and easily provision authentication to new applications and streamline identity management across your hybrid environment from one platform. Incorporate a zero-trust architecture with our industry-proven, time-tested intelligent identity solution.Seller DetailsSellerEntrust, Inc.Phone1-888-690-2424Year Founded1969HQ LocationMinneapolis, MNTwitter@Entrust_Corp6,442 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com3,250 employees on LinkedIn®DescriptionEntrust keeps the world moving safely by enabling strong identities, secure payments, and protected data. We offer an unmatched breadth of solutions that are critical to the future of secure enterprises, governments, the people they serve, and the data and transactions entrusted to them. With our experts serving customers in more than 150 countries and a network of global partners, it’s no wonder the world’s most entrusted organizations trust us.MPOverview Provided by:Martin Pettersson

Kurtosys is a secure, cloud-based digital and reporting platform designed to make investment data & insight delivery pain-free. Our solutions provide an effortless experience for those in need of fully automated and powerful investment report systems, client portals and global investment websites. 

Digital & Reporting Solutions for Investment Managers 
Committed to helping sales and client service teams deliver exceptional document, reporting and digital experiences to investors.

Digital Experiences
Client Reports, Sales and Marketing Collateral, Digital Experiences. Delivered through a single publication data and content store. 

Localized Content
Localized content and reporting to meet the needs of international regulatory requirements and support distribution processes in the most frictionless way possible. 

Data ready for publication
Publication Ready Data. Have a single content store of all your data, content and materials that is publication ready for delivery in every channel and every medium. 

Meet the new demands of ESG enhanced reporting
All managed in the cloud through self-serve user interfaces. Making our technology suitable for every type of firm no matter how small or large.

Our smart, simple, seamless solutions—riteSCAN® Mobile Warehouse for SYSPRO™ and riteTIME® Labor Data & Time Tracking—leverage information and technology to optimize efficiency and sharpen your competitive edge. Trusted by more than 8,000 users and 35 resellers in 10 countries, riteSOFT’s easy-to-use software applications automate and optimize warehouse and manufacturing operations in real-time.

Founded in 2012, springbig is now the number one marketing platform in the cannabis industry. Over the course of almost a decade of bringing customers unparalleled tools for their cannabis businesses, springbig has spread to over 2,000 merchants across the United States and Canada. 

Over the years, we have not only grown our customer base, but the services we offer have developed as well. Today, we have an entire suite of tools for cannabis retailers which includes text message marketing automation, our customer experience and survey platform Feedback, our referral program Budz, our loyalty rewards program, and our compliance suite 360 Permissions™ just to name a few. Not only that but our partnerships and integrations also bring clients huge value. To date, we have partnered with businesses across all parts of the cannabis industry including Weedmaps, Headset, Dutchie, iHeartJane, Flowhub, LeafLogix, OnFleet, and more.

With all of these tools, we know you’ll have questions, which is why each of our customers receives a dedicated customer success manager upon becoming a member.
