detailed_features:
Name: Platform
Features:
    Name: Customization
    Content: Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views. 13 reviewers of Workday Compensation have provided feedback on this feature.
    Percentage: 88
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 13

    Name: Integration APIs
    Content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.
    Percentage: None
    Based On Number Of Reviews: None

    Name: Internationalization
    Content: Based on 11 Workday Compensation reviews. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.
    Percentage: 94
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 11

    Name: User, Role, and Access Management
    Content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc. This feature was mentioned in 14 Workday Compensation reviews.
    Percentage: 93
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 14

    Name: Performance
    Content: Is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks reliably. 17 reviewers of Workday Compensation have provided feedback on this feature.
    Percentage: 92
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 17

    Name: Mobility
    Content: Is accessible from a mobile device and by users on the go. This feature was mentioned in 14 Workday Compensation reviews.
    Percentage: 83
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 14

    Name: Reporting
    Content: Provides analytics tools that reveal important business metrics and track progress. This feature was mentioned in 14 Workday Compensation reviews.
    Percentage: 89
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 14

    Name: Dashboards
    Content: Has a centralized dashboard for users to interact with. 16 reviewers of Workday Compensation have provided feedback on this feature.
    Percentage: 95
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 16

    Name: Reward Structuring
    Content: Based on 29 Workday Compensation reviews. Define compensation packages and allowance plans within the system. Specify the various components of compensation, including base pay, bonuses, and equity. Structure compensation pools and hierarchies for continual planning.
    Percentage: 89
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 29

    Name: Event Management
    Content: Based on 26 Workday Compensation reviews. Coordinate new hire, transfer, promotion, and termination events within the system using rules to automatically facilitate the associated compensation adjustments.
    Percentage: 90
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 26

    Name: Workflow Automation
    Content: As reported in 34 Workday Compensation reviews. Streamline the flow of work processes by establishing triggers and alerts that notify and route information to the appropriate people when their action is required within the compensation process.
    Percentage: 89
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 34

    Name: Compensation HistoryView full feature definition
    Content: Access employee compensation history and talent records when evaluating compensation adjustments to inform decision making. This feature was mentioned in 45 Workday Compensation reviews.
    Percentage: 93
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 45

    Name: Automated Compliance
    Content: Based on 31 Workday Compensation reviews. Maintain compliance with corporate policies, state mandates, and federal regulations regarding compensation with built in compliance features, including automated identification and flagging of unapproved behaviors.
    Percentage: 91
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 31

    Name: Performance Management Integration
    Content: Based on 34 Workday Compensation reviews. Integrate employee performance data from a third-party performance management solution to supplement compensation history and establish pay-for-performance compensation structures.
    Percentage: 88
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 34

    Name: Embedded Analytics
    Content: As reported in 26 Workday Compensation reviews. View budgetory allocations across the organization, compensation information related to individual employees or departments, and underlying compensation trends in analytics dashboards embedded in the system.
    Percentage: 85
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 26

    Name: Reporting Capabilities
    Content: As reported in 31 Workday Compensation reviews. Create standard and ad-hoc reports of compensation data within the system. Trends and other graphical representations of data displayed by analytics dashboards can be included in reports.
    Percentage: 88
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 31

    Name: Compensation Data ManagementView full feature definition
    Content: Easily import data into or export data from the system, and access employee compensation data quickly within the system. Create compensation hierarchies so that managers can access relevant team information. 34 reviewers of Workday Compensation have provided feedback on this feature.
    Percentage: 88
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 34

    Name: Internationalization
    Content: Based on 25 Workday Compensation reviews. Extend compensation configurations around the globe using flexible location profiles, multiple language options, and automatic currency conversion tools within the system.
    Percentage: 87
    Based On Number Of Reviews: 25

what_is:
Centro ASSIST offers expert advice and a streamlined web-app to assist with NDIS compliance, on-boarding staff and business growth. 

We have the:

- Content you require for registration and renewal, core policies and processes
- System and online platform to communicate and share across your organisation
- Assistance to transform your existing policies and processes  

Reduce business overheads with a digital approach to policies, processes and documents. Now NDIS providers can focus on what they do best for participants. Thousands of service providers are using our web-app. 

Centro ASSIST is a part of the Holocentric family and is dedicated to Disability Service Providers. Holocentic is a leading Australian software company, providing world-class business management systems. Centro ASSIST is built on Holocentric’s core strengths and expertise in Business Management Systems and knowledge of the NDIA.  For over 18 years Holocentric has worked with a long list of clients, including Qantas, Westpac, Sydney Water, Australian Defence Force and Icelandair.

Let Centro ASSIST be your quality assurance partner.

- Professional authors to transform existing policies and processes 
- Author new content to meet QSF audit requirements and other business requirements 
- Published in an easy to use web-app to access and share information with your employees
- On-board new staff easily with well-defined policies, processes, registers, templates and forms
- Dedicated Centro ASSIST resources to update your digital documentation
- Reduce auditing effort with content maintained online

The NDIS will succeed if there are enough providers delivering quality services in a safe and reliable manner.
product_description: Easy to use web-app does all the hard-work for you, so your business can focus on the services you provide. Centro ASSIST can help you meet registration, renewal and Quality and Safeguarding Framework (QSF) obligations to seamlessly run your business.Seller DetailsSellerCentro ASSISTTwitter@centro_assist68 Twitter followersTDOverview Provided by:Teresa DaoMarketing Graduate at Centro ASSIST

what_is: UserWay, a global leader in web accessibility, is trusted by millions of websites worldwide. Combining AI and human expertise, UserWay helps organizations fix code violations and meet accessibility laws and standards such as the ADA and WCAG 2.2, making digital content accessible to users with disabilities.
product_description: UserWay is a pioneer in innovative website accessibility technologies. It provides helpful accessibility plugins that work without refactoring your website's existing code and will increase compliance with WCAG 2.1 , ATAG 2.0 , ADA ,& Section 508 requirements.Over 1.4 million websites trust UserWay's accessibility solutions, including governments, banks, large enterprises, and countless SMBs. In fact, our extensive user base is over 20x larger than the next solution. That means our AI-powered rule engine is constantly learning from a vast array of WCAG violations and becoming more robust. Beware of imitators; they often collect behavioral data on your site's users, decrease your site's usability, and may even expose you to legal risks.Seller DetailsSellerUserWayCompany Websiteuserway.orgYear Founded2016HQ LocationWilmington, DelawareTwitter@UserWayOrg725 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com133 employees on LinkedIn®SAOverview Provided by:shahar amiel

what_is:
DSM Tool is an innovative all-in-one dropshipping management software, which allows e-sellers to dropship products from 50+ suppliers to eBay, Shopify, and Facebook. It brings them the automation of the daily dropshipping tasks, such as finding what to sell, adding products to a store, optimizing the listings, syncing their stock together with price, and processing the orders.

The software was created in 2016 by experienced eBay sellers to help other e-sellers to grow their business on eBay. And now more than 175k users tried it with their stores on Shopify and 7 eBay marketplaces (.com, .es, .it., .fr., .de., .ca., .au).

The DSM Tool dropshipping software allows to:

Find what to sell on your eCommerce store on supported retailers and wholesalers.
List single or multiple products in your eBay, Facebook, Shopify store fast and smartly.
Copy product details, descriptions, and photos automatically.
Optimize the listings before posting them in your e-store or afterward.
Monitor and sync the products’ prices and stock and update them automatically.
Process dropshipping orders automatically.
Provide customer support through a centralized dashboard.
Protect your eBay store with alarms and tips.
Learn dropshipping and how to use the software with in-app training.

what_is:
Stop wasting time on paperwork. Start focusing on what you care about; growing your business!
SnapSuite helps contractors improve scheduling, manage project costs, and eliminate the stress of managing paperwork.

SnapSuite is an all-in-one solution for the construction and skilled trade industries, that allows field service companies to easily dispatch technicians, manage projects and easily generate complex quotes in a snap. We help construction companies move away from outdated software and towards better scheduling and business management systems that increase efficiency. 

FEATURES
- A scheduling system for real field workers
- Simple tools to help you track your project costs
- Send invoices and get paid faster
- Integrates with QuickBooks

Many small business owners in the skilled trade industries keep track of projects manually by using white boards, Excel spreadsheets and emails. They often use several disconnected tools just to keep track of 1 client.  Sales staff use Word for quotation templates, then they crunch the numbers in Excel, then send everything to the client as a PDF using Outlook, then they use a calendar to remind them to follow up. Once the client has agreed to the quote, the service or project manager uses Excel or a white board to track the job, getting reports and pictures from staff by text or email and printing hard copies or transferring digital copies to the customer’s file. Then it's accountings turn to step in!

With SnapSuite this whole process is streamlined. SnapSuite was created to help construction businesses improve efficiency. We eliminate manual steps from your day-to-day operations by implementing easy to use software to help you save time and cut costs.  

SnapSuite allows business owners and management to easily analyze real-time reports, enabling them to make smarter business decisions and grow their business.
product_description: SnapSuite is an all-in-one business management software solution for skilled trade and distribution companies, that allows business owners to automate processes.Seller DetailsSellerSnapSuiteTwitter@snapsuiteio50 Twitter followersDBOverview Provided by:Dwain BrowneDedicated to helping contractors improve profitability and customer satisfaction on every job!

what_is:
Fulcrum replaces ERP, MRP, and MES with a Manufacturing Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform, allowing small and mid-sized manufacturers to improve efficiency through workflow optimization and automated data collection. Fulcrum delivers value through a fully digital, paperless workflow leveraging machine learning, automation, predictive analytics, and advanced heuristics to drive throughput and profitability. 

Software doesn't have to be complicated. The software you use in your personal life (Facebook, Uber, Amazon, etc.) is intuitive, and you don't need training to understand how it works. Why should your business software be any different? This includes row crop, field crop, tree crop, specialty crop, livestock, poultry, and fish farms. The center of the system is Activity Based Costing (ABC). what_is:
Sizebay is a virtual fitting room that helps e-commerce and even brick-and-mortar stores provide their shoppers with a personalized shopping experience. 

Your customers can use the platform to calculate their body measurements. The platform then analyses clothing suitability and recommends relevant sizes, helping your customers find the apparel or shoes of their size even without trying them in actuality. 

Stores can make an interactive measurement table for each of their items with ease, create product content such as style guides to make decision-making easier for customers, and show shoppers an entire look. Filters are also available, ensuring that only the products with the right size are shown to customers. 

Last but not the least, the platform features reports which give store owners valuable insights into their product’s performance.

what_is:
Jolt Fulfillment System is a customized e-commerce solution that can be used by multi-channel sellers of all sizes. This solution allows businesses to sell products while also managing shipping and inventory. Jolt automatically downloads orders, updates stock levels, and syncs with existing systems as tasks are performed. 

With its "kits, bundles, and multi-packs" feature, Jolt allows sellers to build kits with a bill of materials, maintain customized group offerings, and recalculate per-piece inventory as needed. The warehouse management capability integrates with an existing WMS and automates product locations and inventory across multiple warehouses. In addition, sellers can create packing slips, generate shipping labels, and complete order processing with this solution.

Jolt Fulfillment System integrates with Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping, BigCommerce, Shopify, Magento, Quickbooks, UPS, and more. 

Pricing information is provided by Jolt. Support is available via phone, email, or an online helpdesk.
product_description:

what_is:
Lirmi is a curriculum management software that helps professors and course coordinators achieve the learning outcomes and bring together students and family members to create a more meaningful learning experience. 

In one platform deans, professors and course coordinators can create content sequences and evaluations, annual and daily planning workflows, communicate with family members and automate the daily classroom activities.

Español
Lirmi es un software de gestión curricular que ayuda a los profesores y coordinadores de cursos a lograr mejores resultados de aprendizaje y a reunir a estudiantes, familias y colegios en torno a experiencias de aprendizaje más significativas.

En una sola plataforma, los directores, profesores y coordinadores pedagógicos pueden crear secuencias de contenido, evaluaciones, flujos de trabajo de planificación anuales y diarios, comunicarse con los miembros de la familia y automatizar las actividades diarias del aula.

what_is:
Contact-Free Authentication Powered by Advanced Biometrics and Blockchain

1Kosmos BlockID leverages advanced biometrics authentication and Blockchain technology to verify the identity of anyone who needs to access any of your systems and applications.

Make sure your employees and customers are who they say they are... Always.
1Kosmos BlockID biometric-based identity solutions are extremely easy to implement and use. They’re fully-cloud based, so there’s no software for you to install (of course, hybrid and on-site versions are also available). And they require nothing more of users than their own mobile phone and the IDs they already have — no technology for them to buy, no fobs or dongles to carry, no codes or pins to type, no forms to fill out, no CAPTCHA puzzles to solve, no passwords to remember — ever.
The BlockID platform is designed to ensure identity is our number one focus at all times.
The use of Blockchain technology makes your BlockID-powered ecosystem unhackable. 
1Kosmos BlockID is fully IAL3 and AAL3 compliant per the NIST SP-800 63-3 guidelines.
product_description: BlockID by 1Kosmos revolutionizes identity management, enabling people and companies to escape from the legacy systems of paper-based documents and move into a true digital identity with unprecedented privacy, security, transparency and individual rights by leveraging the power of blockchain technology.Seller DetailsSeller1KosmosYear Founded2018HQ LocationSomerset, New JerseyTwitter@1KosmosBlockID4,518 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com99 employees on LinkedIn®NROverview Provided by:Nick Roquefort-villeneuve

what_is:
Are you failing to consistently close sales? Despite what some people might tell you, the problem may not be your salesmanship or your pitch—it could be a problem with your qualification methodology.

MEDDIC is the most renowned Sales Qualification Methodology, applicable to any Enterprise Sales Process which is rather complex. The definition of MEDDIC is the acronym it represents, composed of six elements. They represent the MEDDIC checklist as described below:

METRICS: Measure the potential gain leading to the economic benefit of your solution vs. competition.
ECONOMIC BUYER : Identify and meet the person who has the ultimate word to release funds to purchase.
DECISION PROCESS: Know and Influence the process defined by the client to make purchase decision.
DECISION CRITERIA: Know and Influence the criteria defined by the client to make purchase decision.
IDENTIFY PAIN: Identify and Analyze the pains which require your solution to be relieved.
CHAMPION : Identify, Qualify, Develop and Test your Champion or your Internal Seller.
In a nutshell, MEDDIC tells you that if you do the above in any complex B-to-B sales campaign, you win the sale.

We offer both ONLINE and IN-PERSON training and workshop.

Both programs include all the courses that you see here:
https://trainings.meddic.academy/
The main training, being the full MEDDIC bundle, lasts 2 hours approx (10 short 10-15 minutes mini courses):
https://trainings.meddic.academy/bundles/full-meddic-course
The bundle is composed of the MEDDIC original courses plus modules which are exclusively available at MEDDIC Academy (such as "ROI" or "How to Develop Champions").

The training and workshop are facilitated by Darius Lahoutifard, one of the initial sales leaders at PTC, where MEDDIC was born. Unlike other MEDDIC consultants Darius was not just a training facilitator or a VAR Manager at PTC, but a VP managing a Direct Sales team. More about him here:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/meddic/

To see him in action, try this free "Introduction to MEDDIC" course.
https://trainings.meddic.academy/courses/introduction-to-meddic

or this excerpt of one of the trainings:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6lAd-BIEnlU

There are also many educational articles on our blog. https://meddic.academy/blog/

what_is:
Create online forms. Automate workflows. Track Analytics.

MightyForms is an All-in-One Intake Platform that transforms the way you build and manage forms. Automatically recapture lost leads with the Form Abandonment Recovery tool, where you can send a custom message to visitors that abandon your form and invite them to complete their submission.

Track your form performance with the native Form Analytics report, or integrate with Google Analytics. Send form data straight to your CRMs with integrations, Zapier, or even Webhooks and pre-filling forms. 

MightyForms drag & drop Form Builder offers free form templates and full customization options. Receive payments through Stripe and, no matter which plan you choose, get all builder features available. Start building smarter forms today.
product_description:
MightyForms makes building a complex web form into an easy and intuitive process. Create a form from scratch, from a template, or from a PDF form. You can later automatically fill in the submitted data in the PDF form, keep track of new leads with our Continuous Capture technology and add several native integrations like Google Tag Manager and Analytics and Zapier.

Whether you need to create contact forms, surveys, email subscription forms, job applications, order forms, payment forms, send emails, and so on – stand out with a form that matches your brand and gives your new subscriber the experience you know they deserve.Automate the top of your sales funnel with an intake platform that easily performs complex tasks in data collection. Free form templates, drag & drop builder, autoresponder, MightyForms has all the tools you've come to expect from a traditional form builder - and more.You don't have to be in Sales to need to know your form analytics or track abandoned form data. what_is:
From Independent Professionals and small Teams to Studio Agencies and Large Firms, TapChief Workspace is built to manage it all, from pitching to clients to getting paid. 

Workspace lets you manage Clients and improve Conversions. Create a central directory of your network for quick communication, instantly chat or video call with prospects to drive conversions, create on-brand tailored proposals that convert and know when it’s viewed

Workspace  makes Collaboration on Projects seamless and helps tame the chaos of communication with Teams and Clients. You can view and manage all projects on one dashboard, create custom project stages and leverage milestone tracking, share files, start 1-on-1 & group chats in rooms and video call for free.

Teams can increase their productivity and do more of what matters to them with the task management features. Schedule To-do’s, meetings, events and more to never miss a milestone. Track desk-time for timesheet reports, map time to projects & invoice clients with accurate billing. Assign tasks to teams, set due dates & follow-up with smart reminders 

You can create invoices, manage your finances and get paid, on time. Create professional looking, GST compliant invoices and get notified when your client views it. Track expenses, manage your P&L and view all transactions in one place. Send reminders on outstanding accounts and get paid securely with escrow insurance

what_is:
Novade is the leading construction management platform to manage large and complex projects.

Ideal for Developers, General Contractors and Operators looking for a bespoke solution to improve quality, productivity, and safety. 

Our integrated platform connects all modules, projects, and users. 

---MODULES---

NOVADE QUALITY – Build Outstanding Projects & Reputation
• Quality Inspections, Checklists  
• Handover, Commissioning  
• Defect Rectification  
• Drawing Markups & 3D Models 

NOVADE SAFETY - Make Your Business a Safer Place
• Permits to Work, Safety Forms​, Safety Checklist  
• Observations, Inspections, Issues, Preventive and Corrective Actions, Non-compliance (NC) Reports  
• Toolbox meetings  
• Incidents & Near-Miss​ Reports  
• People Qualification & Equipment Certifications 

NOVADE REPORTS - Monitor Field Productivity
• Site Diaries, Daily Progress Reports  
• Capture weather conditions, Workforce Working Hours, Activity Progress, Equipment Usage, Supplies delivery  
• Production Metrics, Automatic Dashboards

NOVADE MAINTENANCE - Manage Inspections and Repairs Effectively
• Asset Registry, Assets Certifications Maintenance Contracts  
• Inspections​, Preventive Maintenance Checklists, Meter Readings  
• Request Repairs; Jobs  
• Inventory, Spare Parts

NOVADE WORKFORCE - Manage and Monitor Workforce in the Field
• Employee profiles, Induction, Qualifications, Teams & Groups 
• Check in / Check out Leave Management, Activity Assignment, Overtime 
• Timecards Approval, HR Reports, Payroll Preparation

NOVADE ACTIVITY - Deploy Lean Methodology in the Field
• Activity Templates, Task Assignment, Task-linked Checklists  
• Gantt Charts, Sequencing, Milestones   
• Real-time Progress & Dashboards

Other important information:
• Real-time powerful analytics with Novade Insights  
• High data security levels  
• Strict policies on data privacy  
• Offline mode and auto-sync with cloud servers  
• Dedicated customer support

---ABOUT NOVADE---

Novade is the leading construction management software for the building and infrastructure industry. The world’s largest Contractors, Developers, Owners, and Operators trust Novade to drive their digital transformation. Today, our applications are used by more than 100,000 users.

Please visit our website for more information. Schedule a demo or ask for a free trial by emailing us at contact@novade.net.

Proxy manager Is a sophisticated open-source tool, enabling you to manage all your proxy network operations in one place. This easy to use software integrates seamlessly with various data collection platforms including Luminati. what_is:
Empowering organisations through digital solutions

We drive digital transformation to help your business thrive through end-to-end innovative solutions. From idea to product, business strategy to cutting-edge technology, we build and maintain all your digital needs to transform your goals into reality. 

With a solid background in building top-notch technology, we have grown into a full-service agency ready to take on all of your business challenges. Focused on helping you conquer new audiences and outperform competitors, we partner with our clients through a strong set of values to solve problems and seize new opportunities.

Codegram was born in 2009 from the hearts of 3 talented high-profile coders whose passion for building humane technology brought them together. Disenchanted by the traditional prioritisation of price over quality, they had the ambition to build an ethical company that would allow them to offer high-level solutions with no restrictions.

Priding itself on its diversity and inclusion, Codegram has grown into a 30+ team of international experts in multiple fields, evolving from a technology firm to a full-service digital agency backed by a wide range of success stories. We have extremely high standards and we work hard to exceed them redefining the limits of digital innovation.

In parallel to our work with each client, we are the organisers of more than ten editions of worldwide technical conferences trusted by a total of more than 5,000 attendees from 50+ different countries. We believe in people, in synergies and connections. Innovation is in our DNA and we strongly trust in digital evolution for business revolution.

Our mission is to help you acquire new customers and create positive brand experiences for your customers so that they
keep coming back to you.

At ENCE, we are experts in marketing, and we do marketing with excellence.

what_is:
The Most Flexible, Easy-to-Setup and Easy-to-Use Survey Platform for Departments and Enterprises
For organizations that need more advanced capabilities and reporting than SurveyMonkey and don’t want the cost and complexities associated with Qualtrics, Alchemer Survey strikes the perfect balance.

Its market-leading flexibility, ease-of-use, and speed-to-value lets users drive feedback collection, analysis, and outcomes on day one, without requiring multiple department modules or IT resources. We also provide unlimited surveys and questions, and we don’t charge per response.

Our product offerings include:
• Alchemer Survey – collect the best feedback
• Alchemer Workflow – close the feedback loop
• Alchemer Digital – engage your web and mobile customers

To see how CX teams are using Alchemer to improve their customer experience programs, watch this short webinar: https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/18320/602827
positioning_against_competitor: Alchemer offers nearly twice as many question types as SurveyMonkey and Qualtrics. In addition, Alchemer beats SurveyMonkey and Qualtrics in Implementation, User Adoption, and Time to Go Live. Alchemer also won Expert’s Choice, Supreme Software, and Great User Experience from FinancesOnline.Alchemer makes it easy to standardize on one survey platform across your entire organization, protecting data, ensuring IT governance and management, and reducing costs for procurement. Mozilla standardized on Alchemer and wrote a single bit of code to remove PII from millions of surveys. With Alchemer, you will enforce data governance, manage costs, and make your users, IT, InfoSec, and Procurement successful.Seller DetailsSellerAlchemerCompany Websitewww.alchemer.comHQ LocationLouisville, COTwitter@AlchemerHQ7,452 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com189 employees on LinkedIn®MBOverview Provided by:Martinette Botha

V2STech Solutions offers a spectrum of software implementation services.  Our core offering includes services like enterprise application development, mobile application development, User interface & User experience(UI/UX) design, Payment gateway development and SaaS product development. 

Programming Language : Java, Groovy/Grails,  React, React Native, Android, Swift, Python, AngularjS, IONIC, NodeJS
Web Technologies : J2EE (Jsp, Servlet), React Web, ExtJS, JavaScript, HTML, NodeJS, AnugularJS, Struts, JSP, Django, Flask
Related Frameworks : Spring Web, Spring Security, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Spring Data, JPA/Hibernate, Dialogflow, Webdriver, UiPath, Elastic Search,
Web/App Server : Apache, Tomcat, Weblogic, JBoss, Google App Engine, AWS, Nginx
Other tools and technology : LDAP Server, Open CV, Redis, Mule, PHP, JQuery, HTML,CSS, Firebase
Databases : MySQL, MS SQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Firebase
Project tools : Maven , ANT, Jenkins, Sonar, Rally, Jira, Zoho, Confluence, SVN, Git, CVS, Bitbucket, git, Hudson, Bamboo, Jenkins, SoapUI pro, Eclipse, Visual Studio Code, TIBCO Jaspersoft, Docker, Swagger, Raspberry Pi

Our key statistics are as below
We have served more than 30 customers across India, United Kingdom, USA and Abu dhabi.
Over 2000 man month’s project execution experience
We have executed more than 50+ enterprise projects
Participated in development of 5 products from inception stage to go-to-market for technology startups
We have setup 5+ offshore development centers for our key customers outside/within India
Our senior team has HFI certified usability architect, TOGAF certified enterprise architect, Enterprise architects and SCRUM certified professionals
We have extensive work experience in using open source frameworks and have used it for large enterprise implementations
We have developed custom payment gateway solutions for high transaction volume with 100% PCI compliance.
We have participated in development of smart citizen solutions for municipal corporation and local government authorities in India

Top reasons TO MAKE V2STECH YOUR TECHNICAL PARTNER

We offer complete solutions right from user interface design, software development to hosting on cloud servers online. Our services are customised for your business requirements.

We always find cost effective solutions with use of open source technology frameworks with complete data security
We work as your team with complete focus on intellectual property protection, quality delivery and effective communication
We can setup Offshore Development Center (ODC) with dedicated team. We also offer BOT (Build, Operate and Transfer) services

what_is:
Heyflow helps you converting website visitors into leads, sign-ups, and sales. Using our drag-and-drop builder, you can create sign-up funnels, lead generation flows and interactive multi-step forms to build an engaging website experience. Analyze the performance of your flows by natively integrating with the marketing tools growth marketers need.

✔️Build
Choose from 25+ building blocks to build a versatile flow in no time – just drag & drop! Define routes and if-this-then-that logic to engage smarter, more human, and simply better. Embed your flow on any website or just use it as stand-alone landing page. Your flow is optimized for mobile devices, 100% responsive, and loads blazingly fast even when your users have a slow internet connection.

✔️Design
Fully customize your flow to perfectly match your brand and convey your values. Leverage the power of style variables and a pixel-perfect experience. Over 30,000 icons in three coherent weights, 53 categories, and 720 subcategories are ready for you to speed up your workflow.

✔️Analyze
Understand your users’ behaviour with Heyflow's analytics dashboard. Measure your flow’s performance by natively integrating Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics or Facebook Pixel. Pass URL parameters automatically from your landing page to your flow.

✔️Integrate
Receive your responses via email, GSheets, Pipedrive, Slack, Asana, and over 2,000 other services via Zapier.

Get started with a 14-day trial and a free personal demo to become a better growth marketer today!

To keep your business running smoothly, we also offer the highest level of platform stability in the industry - all while upholding strict global data privacy protection laws. 

Premium & affordable

Save time and money with Swaarm: unlike other tracking platforms, our unique and hyper-efficient tech infrastructure allows us to offer clients a premium platform at a fraction of the cost.   Businesses of all sizes use Swaarm to optimize their campaigns, from leading global partners to boutique agencies. 

Flexibility

Our products have been engineered from the ground up, and we’re constantly developing them in line with clients’ needs and new market requirements. 
Our versatility is our greatest strength: we adapt to your needs, not the other way around. 

Ease of Use

Our extensive reporting features mean you can use Swaarm as your single source of performance marketing truth. With all your data in one place, you can measure, automate and optimize your marketing efforts - all from the one dashboard. 
Our intuitive, easy-to-use platform appeals to developers and marketers alike, and our automation rules make campaign optimization accessible to everyone.

what_is:
4n6 MDaemon Converter is an all-in-one toolkit to convert MDaemon Server profile data in several email formats (.eml, .pst, .mbox), document formats (.pdf, .txt, .html, .csv, .vcf, .ics) and all cloud-based email services (Gmail, Google Workspace, Outlook.com, Microsoft 365, Yahoo Mail, etc.). MDaemon Server migration tool is an excellent product that can upload MDaemon Server profile data automatically in the software panel from default storage location. 

After uploading MDaemon Server profile data in the software panel, users can preview all MDaemon folders in the software panel such as Emails, Contacts, Calendars, Tasks, Notes, Files, Inbox, Sent Items, Deleted Items, etc. Even it automatically counts the total number of items in each folder and after that preview them in the software panel. Users can also check or uncheck only required folders from whole database.

Forensic MDaemon Converter software is also able to analyse MDaemon server data by previewing in Hex View, Message Header View, Raw Message View, and Content View. This product is specially developed for MDaemon Server forensic investigation, therefore 4n6 software developers added a separate option to export MDaemon emails into Adobe PDF printable documents. Even forensic investigators can use resultant PDF files for legal use.

After selecting specific MDaemon folders from software interface, press Export button and choose a saving option from dropdown menu. After that select a destination folder to store output data and hit on the Save button to start MDaemon server migration process. MDaemon Server Converter has a separate option to extract email addresses, phone numbers into simple text files while attachments can be exported in real available file extensions.

The tool also provides several advanced but common features like multiple file naming options to manage output data by Subject, From-Subject, From-Date-Subject, Year-Month-Day-Hour-Minute-Second-Subject, Message Auto Increment, Custom Naming, etc. During MDaemon Server migration process if software found bad sectors, then it will automatically skip the corrupted data conversion. Even it will create a log report to show error log report.

MDaemon Converter software also has an isolated option to export MDaemon contacts into vCard contacts and CSV contacts. MDaemon calendars can be stored in standard ICS file extension. This software preserves actual folder or sub-folder structure; therefore, users can easily understand the output data. It also holds email attachments, subject, signature, time, date, year, hyperlinks, headings, inline images, internet header, etc.

what_is:
Simple to use iterative regression program.
Unique: multidirectional fitting, which produces much better results for invertible model functions. (E.g. it finally demonstrates that the Body Mass Index = m/h³, not m/h².) 
Realistic parameter confidence estimation based on x and y data precision and error propagation through the model function.
Version 1 features 16 common models with real life examples from different sciences, but more will be added upon request.
Also good for education because of the visualisation of the fitting process.

what_is:
Metabob automatically finds complex logic-based errors hiding in your code and offers advanced developer productivity metrics

Metabob’s offering provides tools to enhance developer productivity, improve code health, and helps teams to efficiently allocate resources.
Metabob is able to detect where problems are and how they interact with other aspects of your codebase, as well as offer plain-text recommendations on how to fix them. Metabob creates a space where engineering managers can track the performance of individual team members and the team as a whole, delivering metrics where other management solutions fall short.
product_description: Metabob is an AI-assisted tool used to debug and visualize Python code. Using a combination of conventional status analysis, attention-based models, and a 360-degree Visualizer, Metabob is able to detect where problems are, how they interact with other aspects of your codebase, as well as offer plain-text recommendations on how to fix them. Metabob’s model is written on open source code from python developers across the globe, creating a dynamic, uniquely intuitive base to help identify where problems will likely occur. Schedule a demo or install us on GitHub, GitLab, and BitBucket!Seller DetailsSellerMetabobRHOverview Provided by:Rika H

what_is:
Interactive Voice Response (IVR) is an automated telephony system which responds to the human voice and keyboard inputs with pre-recorded voice messages. IVR systems automatically take the incoming calls. And depending upon the customer inputs, it routes the calls to the best-suited agent.

By integrating IVR number into your telephony system, you can handle a large volume of calls. The identification, segmentation, and routing processes of all the incoming calls are also enhanced making business call process flawless.

IVR number helps customers quickly find the answers to their queries without any human assistance and thus saves agents from answering mundane questions. It frees up, agent’s time and improves their productivity.

Intelligent call forwarding improves the system by routing the calls to the best-suited agent. With cloud technology, you can also easily scale your IVR system on-demand without having to worry about the added infrastructure or cost.

what_is: Claims Fraud is a serious problem for Insurance Companies as it brings down their profits considerably. Currently, This problem is handled using either internal scoring based engines or rely on Third party agencies for investigations. These rule based systems are static in nature and involve lot of manual efforts, making the process slow and prone to errors. To tackle this, Virtusa-GCTS has developed a Machine-Learning based solution which will flag suspect claims as ‘fraud’ and those claims can be subjected to more scrutiny. It uses Boosting based AI models and saves considerable effort.

what_is:
Engage by Cell is a B2B SaaS company that began 16 years ago in San Francisco, CA. We help organizations capture the immediate attention of any audience by delivering cloud-based solutions that improve communication, increase productivity, and create effective engagement. 

We've served thousands of organizations with our mobile tools including text messaging, mobile web apps, audio guides, GPS mapping, digital wallet cards, and more. Clients can build a mobile-friendly and responsive website in mere minutes for training, onboarding, storing content, etc. Send a text message or email campaign using our proprietary SMS scheduler and platform. Mobile touches, reminders and “burst learning” via SMS improve your organization’s learning and responsiveness. Our off-the-shelf, drag-and-drop, cloud-based solutions cover every aspect of mobile engagement.
product_description:
Engage by Cell delivers cloud-based solutions that improve communication, increase productivity, and create effective engagement. With our customer-focused mindset, we solve problems through mobile technology.
 

 Engage by Cell’s platform combines the instant communication of text messaging with the flexibility of mobile web app development. 
 

 Our mobile solutions help organizations quickly connect with any audience and provide essential resources faster.
 

 Our clients are diverse: cultural venues engaging visitors with a smartphone tour, workforce development agencies reaching out to jobseekers, managers sharing training content, HR professionals distributing benefit information, and nonprofits collecting donations via text message. New use cases are born everyday. 
 

 With 81% of adults carrying a smartphone everywhere they go, mobile technology has the power to induce higher efficiency, increase productivity, improve customer service and communicate effectively in and out of the workplace. 
 

 With an easy, no-code drag and drop interface, our mobile solutions are implemented within a few days without the need of an IT department. Accessed via text message, QR code, or link, audiences love our no-downloads-required mobile web apps.Seller DetailsSellerEngage by CellYear Founded2006HQ LocationSan Francisco, CATwitter@engagebycell237 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.comDescriptionEngage by Cell is a B2B SaaS company that began 16 years ago in San Francisco, CA. what_is:
Entri is the API for custom domains. We make it easy for your application to connect, secure, sell, and power custom domains.

POWER

Incentivize upgrades in your product by offering custom domains. Entri Power makes it easy to deploy this feature quickly and easily, with just a few lines of code.

SELL

Create a new revenue stream by selling domains to your users, right from your own application UI. Entri Sell is a no-cost product that pays the highest commissions in the industry, regardless of top level domain. Integration is as simple as adding a few lines of code - no need to become a registrar.

CONNECT

Drive faster user adoption and better retention by automatically configuring DNS records for your users. Entri Connect creates a seamless user experience for connecting custom domains, and supports domains for 35 DNS providers (and counting).

SECURE

Automatically provision SSL certificates within your application - no need to manage renewals or become a certificate authority. Entri Secure takes the headache out of SSL provisioning, at an average savings of 40% compared to other SSL for SaaS providers.


CROWDED ROADMAP? NO PROBLEM.

Entri was built by engineers who have been where you are. Improve usability, without deprioritizing anything else on your roadmap. All of Entri’s products integrate with a simple copy and paste code and a little QA, with a pre-built, fully whitelabellable UI to keep the product marketing team happy.

PRICING FROM STARTUPS TO ENTERPRISES

Whether you’re just starting out with 10 users, or managing 10 million SSL certificates, we have pricing that meets your needs, with economies of scale, and no long-term contracts for startups.

To get started, reach out to our sales team, or try an instant demo here: entri.com/demo
product_description: Entri helps applications make it easy for their users to configure custom domains. No manual DNS setup process is required.Seller DetailsSellerEntriYear Founded2017HQ LocationNew York , USTwitter@ThisIsEntri118 Twitter followersLinkedIn® Pagewww.linkedin.com16 employees on LinkedIn®ASOverview Provided by:Abe StoreyCEO at Entri | Partner at JARS Capital

Eaton Business School (EBS), an entity of Westford Education Group, has developed an ideal learning platform to provide the best tools and resources for busy working executives around the globe. At Eaton, we truly realize the importance of giving learners the opportunity to identify real world trends by interacting with fellow professionals from different markets and industries and to learn from industry experienced faculties. Learners representing more than 100 nationalities make their learning journey effectively through the group’s live interactive online sessions. At EBS, we do not teach. We help you learn.

Eaton Business School’s strategic partnership with accredited Universities and internationally recognized awarding Bodies in the United Kingdom and Europe provides the learners with globally accepted certifications in line with the current market trends and business requirements.

Through our credit transfer options from the Master level Extended Diploma program, the learners get a direct access to the final dissertation stage of MBA/MA/MSC from reputed Universities. The Certified Manager status from the reputed Chartered Management Institute, UK gives our learners value-add for their money, time and effort. Our state-of-the-art Learning Management System helps our learners to continue their Masters or Diploma programs that are flexible and affordable, at the comfort of their home or office. Online learning is the greatest tool for continuous learning, it is not the future, it is the NOW!

what_is:
Apeaksoft Blu-ray Player for Mac allows you to enjoy Blu-ray disc/folder/ISO files with lossless quality on Mac. Apart from that, it enables you to play 4K UHD, 1080p/720p HD and SD videos including HD MPG, HD MPEG, HD MPEG2, HD MPEG4, HD MP4, QuickTime HD MOV and common video files like MP4, MTS, MKV, AVI, FLV, MOV and more. Moreover, it enables you to choose your needed video and audio track. You can also choose your needed language as you like. 
Key functions: 
1. Play any Blu-ray disc/folder/ISO files on Mac 
This Blu-ray Player enables you to play any 2D/3D Blu-ray disc, Blu-ray folder/ISO image files with high quality of video and audio. So you can enjoy your videos with perfect image quality. 
2. Play any video like 4K UHD, 1080p/720p HD and SD, MP4, MOV, etc. 
This professional Mac Blu-ray Player can also play 4K UHD, 1080p/720p HD and SD videos for better watching experience. You can enjoy any HD videos like HD AVI, HD H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, HD MKV, etc. Meanwhile, you can play common videos like MP4, MOV, M4V, MKV, AVI, WMV, TS, etc. on Mac. 
3. Choose your needed video and audio track 
With this Blu-ray Player for Mac, you can set the most suitable subtitle track by clicking video, and then clicking video track. You can also click audio, and then choose your needed audio track, audio channel and audio device. 
4. Wonderful user experience 
Apeaksoft Blu-ray Player for Mac is an easy-to-use media player program. Its simple operation steps let you use it easily without any confusion.

what_is:
broadpeak.io is a video API-based platform that offers content providers, pay-TV operators, and OTT service providers an easy, fast, and reliable way to deliver advanced streaming quality to their subscribers.
 It adapts the streams in real-time, so viewers get the right ones automatically. It personalizes streams based on information about the consumer, the content rights, the network, the location, the device, and more.
 The platform contextualizes video streaming by proposing applications such as Content Replacement, Virtual Channel or DAI, with more to come.
 From an end-user experience standpoint, the broadpeak.io service is a game changer as it ensures the content each viewer is watching is simply the most relevant at all times regardless of what video delivery platform is being used.

what_is:
NLP Lab (previously known as Annotation Lab) is a Free End-to-End No-Code platform for document labeling and AI/ML model training. It enables domain experts - nurses, doctors, lawyers, accountants, investors, etc. – to extract meaningful facts from text documents, images or PDFs and train models that will automatically predict those facts on new documents. This is done by using state-of-the-art Spark NLP and Spark OCR pre-trained models or by tuning models to better handle specific use cases. 

John Snow Labs’ NLP Lab supports the end-to-end process from starting an annotation project to the deployment of a trained model, all without writing a line of code. 
Based on an auto-scaling architecture powered by Kubernetes, it can scale to many teams and projects. Enterprise-grade security is provided for free including support for air-gap environments, zero data sharing, role-based access, full audit trails, MFA, and identity provider integrations. It allows powerful experiments for model training and finetuning, model testing, and model deployment as API endpoints.
product_description: John Snow Labs Annotation Lab is a Free End-to-End No-Code platform for data labeling and DL model training. It is a robust solution that enables customers to annotate their data and train/tune DL models in a simple, fast, and efficient project-based workflow without writing a line of code.Seller DetailsSellerJohn Snow LabsHQ LocationLewes, DelawareTwitter@JohnSnowLabs41,201 Twitter followersDTOverview Provided by:Dia TrambitasHead of Product, John Snow Labs
supported_languages: Danish, German, English, French, Portuguese, Romanian, Spanish
pricing_plans:
Name: Community
Price: Free
Description: NLP Lab is a Free tool, with support for unlimited projects, users, documents, community models, teams, analytics, workflows, audit, No-Code Model Training & Active Learning.
Features:
- Support for text, image, video and audio annotations
- Multi-lingual text labeling
- Span annotations & overlapping entities
- Label relations & dependencies
- Unlimited projects, users, documents, models
- Project grouping
- Project searching/filtering
- Full API access
- Task assignment
- Task tagging and comments
- Role based task status
- Duplicate tasks detection
- Feedback & Comments on completions
- Consensus Analysis/IA Agreement
- Quality review workflows
- Performance Dashboards
- Project configuration based on existing models
- Pre-annotations with model assisted labeling
- Active learning: auto-retrain models on the fly
- Transfer learning: start from pre-trained models
- Bring your own models
- Precision/Recall Reports for Trained Models
- Model Hub Integration
- Role based access control
- Annotation Versioning
- Full audit trail
- LDAP/AD integration - User import/Login
- On-Premise / Air-Gap Deployment

Name: Healthcare
Price: Free Trial
1 License Per Year
Description: The Healthcare edition offers access to pretrained healthcare-specific models published on the NLP Models Hub.
Features:
- All features from the Community library
- Pre-annotations with rules & regex
- Automatic detection of 400+ clinical and biomedical entities
- Automatic detection of clinical assertion status detection (negation detection)
- Automatic detection of 60+ healthcare-specific relation extraction
- Automatic entity normalization (coding) to 10+ medical terminologies
- Transfer learning for named entity recognition models
- Ready to use healthcare-specific word, chunk, and sentence embeddings

Name: Visual
Price: Free Trial
1 License Per Year
Description: The visual edition offers access to OCR features for image preprocessing and digitization, as well as to Visual NER based preannotation and model training.
Features:
- All features from the Community library
- Support for annotations on multi-page scanned or generated PDFs
- Support for image annotation (png)
- Text search in image documents
- Multi line chunk annotations
- Sticky token selection
- Custom region annotation
- Relations annotation
- Text preannotation in image or PDF documents
- Support for tuning Visual NER models with custom annotation

what_is:
Back when I started my self-learning part of programming, I was seeking to find the optimal IDE and concluded that VSCode was the one for me. As I was becoming increasingly familiar with this interface, I started realizing that VSCode offered a vast array of shortcuts. However, while I knew of the existence of such shortcuts, it was unclear which one performed a particular function. As a result, finding our which shortcuts were handy for useful and ultimately incorporating them in my daily use, proved to be an unnecessarily time-consuming task.
 

 To overcome this, I have created VSCheatsheet which uses .gifs to illustrate the function of each shortcut. Each illustration, shows in a simple and straight-forward manner the effect of pressing a particular shortcut. A pop-up with the keys pressed is shown at the exact timing the command is given. A prescription of the keys to be pressed for a function (in each particular operating system) is provided at the bottom of the relevant illustration.
 

 👉 15+ illustrations of the most frequently-used shortcuts
 👉 5+ illustrations of selected extensions that would enhance your productivity
 👉 newsletter alerts for new shortcuts added in the future
 

 Our team welcomes all constructive feedback and shortcut requests by users to optimize this product and create a value-enhancing experience
product_description:
Back when I started my self-learning part of programming, I was seeking to find the optimal IDE and concluded that VSCode was the one for me. As I was becoming increasingly familiar with this interface, I started realizing that VSCode offered a vast array of shortcuts. However, while I knew of the existence of such shortcuts, it was unclear which one performed a particular function. As a result, finding our which shortcuts were handy for useful and ultimately incorporating them in my daily use, proved to be an unnecessarily time-consuming task.
 

 To overcome this, I have created VSCheatsheet which uses .gifs to illustrate the function of each shortcut. what_is:
The quicker and easier a customer finds the product he is looking for, the higher the chances of him purchasing it. If he finds it difficult to find his desired product in your store, he is more likely to abandon the store. 
 

 If you have thousands of products with varying attributes, you must have some sort of a mechanism by which customers can reach their desired product easily. This is where our Magento 2 sorting extension comes in. It allows your customers to sort products by 14 different parameters on category and search pages. For example, if a customer wants to find the cheapest product in a certain category, he can sort products by price in ascending order. If he wants to find the most rated products, he can sort it by rating, and so on. 
 

 Improved product sorting improves customer's shopping experience and increases conversions. 
 

 Features:
 

 - Offer 14 product sorting options
 - Reorder sorting options
 - Set the default sorting option

what_is:
Vizit is a groundbreaking predictive image analytics platform that uses artificial intelligence to measure, manage, and optimize the effectiveness of brand imagery. Ideal for ecommerce, research, and innovation teams, the Vizit platform empowers teams to capture attention and drive sales faster, more efficiently, and more cost-effectively than ever before. 

Vizit’s technology harnesses the organic interactions millions of consumers have with online commercial imagery to generate new AI-powered models of their visual preferences. These models, called Audience Lenses, give brands the ability to evaluate visual content and new concepts “through the eyes” of their target audiences, ensuring the images used to represent their products are effective at capturing their desired audience’s attention and are able to trigger conversion.

Today, Vizit has enterprise customers in 10 countries across a range of industries, including several of the top 10 largest food and beverage companies, the largest motorcycle manufacturer, and the largest cosmetics and beauty company in the world.

Discover more at https://www.vizit.com/.

what_is:
Sparkle is a user-friendly website builder for macOS that enables businesses to create websites without requiring technical skills. Its interface is visually appealing, combining a freeform layout, a WYSIWYG interface, and a complete set of design and animation tools.

Sparkle makes it easy for teams to import and update their old website or start a new project from scratch and publish it online. Managers can say goodbye to tedious tasks such as resizing and compressing images, optimizing and minifying code, working around browser differences and bugs, dealing with CDNs and caches, addressing privacy concerns, and future-proofing the code.
product_description:
Sparkle is a website builder macOs native. It’s radically visual, combining a freeform layout, a WYSIWYG interface, a full set of tools, and truly no code and technical jargon. We created an intuitive and comfortable creation space akin to a graphic design application.
Customizing your web designs will be a piece of cake, faster and more fun than ever.
Whether it's a personal profile, portfolio, landing page, one-page site, e-commerce, company website or something a bit more elaborate, Sparkle will help you work faster and become super productive.
We de-code web technologies for you.Seller DetailsSellerCrinon srlAGOverview Provided by:Alberto  galli
supported_languages: German, English, French, Italian, Japanese, Dutch, Spanish, Chinese (Simplified)

what_is:
Strac is a 1-stop shop for all things PII (Personally Identifiable Information). Strac is a Data Loss Prevention software that protects businesses from security and compliance risks by a) automatically detecting and redacting sensitive data across all communication channels like email, slack, zendesk, google drive, one drive, intercom, etc. and b) protecting sensitive data on front end apps and backend servers such that sensitive data never touches servers.

Integrate with your SaaS apps in minutes, eliminate data leaks and be compliant with PCI, SOC 2, HIPAA, GDPR, CCPA. Strac's accurate machine learning models, real time notifications, unique redaction experience saves employees time and very productive.

Brave Zebra is an independent game outsourcing company that provides services worldwide.

Our team specializes in 2D/3D assets, programming, animation, VFX, UI/UX, game porting, design, and production. We develop for mobile platforms, PC, and consoles, using Unity3D and Unreal Engine, as well as Android and iOS technologies.

We have collaborated with companies such as Digital Sun, Gears for Breakfast ApS, Ubisoft, META Publishing, and Savage, among others.

We take pride in working on projects we believe in and are committed to providing customized high-quality solutions that exceed your expectations. Our diverse set of skills allows us to be flexible, meet deadlines, and stay within budget.

what_is:
Simply Contact is an award-winning customer support outsourcing company offering multilingual and multichannel customer services globally. Our goal is to simplify customer service for world-class brands by delivering KPI-driven contact centers in 18+ languages.

We have extensive experience in various industries, ensuring high-quality service and client satisfaction. We tailor our support solutions to the specific needs of different sectors, including Fintech, Travel & Airlines, E-commerce & Retail, and more.

Our customers reduce up to 70% of costs compared to expenses on in-house contact centers while increasing the quality.

Our key outsourcing services:
❯ Multilingual and Omnichannel Customer Support
❯ Outbound and Inbound Support
❯ Front-office and Back-office Support
❯ Technical Support
❯ Telemarketing 

We ensure a comprehensive workflow cycle for your customer support needs. From the launching of your project to its ongoing operation, we've got every aspect covered. We do it through:
1) Quality Assurance
2) Recruitment
3) In-House Training Center
4) Regular Reporting and Analytics
5) Uninterrupted Operations
6) IT Setup and Maintenance

We are a trusted service provider for Wizz Air, Metro Cash & Carry, Bolt, Yves Rocher, Fareportal, the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine, etc.

Webtronic Labs is a top-tier development company that specializes in Javascript-based solutions. Our core mission is to deliver software and automation that provide our clients with real competitive advantages in their respective markets. We achieve this by assembling a team of experts, including frontend and backend developers, AWS and Google Cloud specialists, designers, business analysts, and QA professionals, who are all handpicked to ensure that we deliver high-quality software that meets US standards.

Since our founding in 2018, Webtronic Labs has experienced rapid growth, and this can be attributed to our rigorous in-house human resources selection process, which ensures that we only hire the best developers capable of delivering exceptional work. Additionally, our in-house project management system accurately tracks each developer's performance at all times, providing our clients with transparency and accountability throughout the development process.

At Webtronic Labs, we are committed to delivering outstanding results to our clients, and this is reflected in our 90-day warranty policy. This policy ensures that if any bugs or issues are discovered after delivery, we will promptly fix them at no additional cost to the client. This has enabled us to build a proven track record of success and a satisfied client base that includes notable companies such as Arizona State University, PwC, Apple, and others.

what_is:
GSDCost is the international standard for establishing and optimising accurate method-time-cost benchmarks for sustainable garment cost optimisation and manufacturing excellence. GSDCost supports a more collaborative, transparent and sustainable supply chain, in which brands and manufacturers establish and optimise ‘International Standard Time Benchmarks’ using standard motion codes and predetermined times. This use of a common language and standards supports accurate cost prediction, fact based negotiation, and a more efficient garment manufacturing process, while concurrently delivering on CSR commitments.

It establishes International Time Standards by applying the appropriate Predetermined Motion Codes to each step in the Method Standard.

These 39 Motion Codes, can be used as building blocks to create thousands of operations and features and unlimited product styles. 
Main benefits
5 % Reduction in SMVs
+5 % Increase in productivity
+10 % Improvment in OTDP

what_is:
📢 What is Shapo.io?
Shapo makes it super simple to collect, manage, and showcase your best testimonials, hassle-free. With 5 years in the social proof niche, we've observed just how vital it is for businesses to display testimonials and elements that enhance customer trust and credibility. Shapo.io was born out of this insight to empower you! 🌐

🌐 Seamless Testimonial Collection
Create compelling and high-converting testimonial collection forms to share anywhere, or effortlessly import your existing testimonials from across the web. It's as easy as 1-2-3! ✨

🏢 Organized Testimonial Management
Streamline your testimonials in one central location with distinct workspaces for various products or services. Say goodbye to scattered feedback and hello to organized excellence! 📊

🌟 Customizable Widgets
Show off your best testimonials with our customizable widgets, building trust in your brand and giving your audience the confidence to make a purchase. Your success stories, beautifully displayed! 🌈

📱 Collect From Everywhere
Gather up all the awesome things your customers have said about you on social media (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn) or on review sites (G2, Capterra, Google), and more! It's time to bring them all into one spot and never miss a positive word. 🙌

📣 Boost Your Presence
Harness the incredible power of social proof by flaunting your testimonials in emails, social media posts, and sticking them directly onto your sales pages – pretty much wherever your customers are! 📈

💻 Easy Integration
Copy and paste your widget JavaScript snippet into any website or platform, such as Shopify, WordPress, Bubble, WebFlow – you name it! Seamlessly integrate Shapo.io into your digital landscape. 💡

Best of all, Shapo.io offers a FREE plan, so everyone can experience the magic. 🎉

what_is:
Hi there! We’re KlearStack, the Document Intelligence Company. 

KlearStack is an Intelligent Document Processing platform that uses machine learning, computer vision, predictive analytics, and NLP to automate manual data processing. KlearStack streamlines data extraction from invoices, receipts, mandates, or any other random document. what_is:
Conversazione con Gemini
immagine del profilo
Zimmerwriter è un software b2b o b2c? 
Unfortunately, I can't definitively determine whether Zimmerwriter is a B2B or B2C software without more information. Here's why:

What is Zimmerwriter?

I couldn't find any software or company called "Zimmerwriter." It's possible that:
The name is misspelled. If you rephrase the question with the correct spelling, I might be able to find it.
It's a smaller or very niche software. More details about what it does would help me categorize it.
B2B vs. B2C Explained

B2B (Business-to-Business): Software designed for use by other businesses. Examples include project management tools, customer relationship management (CRM) software, and accounting software.
B2C (Business-to-Consumer): Software designed for individual consumers. Examples include games, music streaming apps, and personal finance software.
How to Tell if a Software is B2B or B2C

Consider these factors:

Target audience: Who is the software designed for? Businesses or individuals?
Features: Does the software focus on problems businesses generally face (e.g., collaboration, data management), or more personal needs (e.g., entertainment, budgeting)?
Pricing: Is the pricing structured for enterprise-level budgets (B2B) or individual subscriptions (B2C)?
Website: Check the software's website. The language and marketing often indicate their target market.
Please provide any additional details you have about Zimmerwriter, and I'll gladly help you determine if it's B2B or B2C!

immagine del profilo
https://www.rankingtactics.com/zimmwriter/
Absolutely! Based on my analysis of the ZimmWriter website, it appears to be primarily a B2B (Business-to-Business) software. Here's why:

Target Audience:

Content Marketers and Bloggers: The software focuses heavily on streamlining content creation and SEO optimization, tasks that are vital for businesses trying to attract and engage online audiences.
Agencies: The ability to handle bulk content generation would be particularly useful for agencies managing multiple clients.
Features:

SEO Focus: Features like the SEO Blog Writer and Topical Authority Generator point towards helping businesses improve their search engine rankings and content strategy, which is crucial for business visibility
Content Generation: Tools for creating blogs, articles, and even AI image generation are primarily valuable in a business context for websites, marketing materials, and social media.
Collaboration Potential: While not explicitly stated, the ability to manage bulk content projects could suggest collaborative features suitable for B2B teams.
Pricing:

While pricing isn't publicly listed, the language on the website suggests a cost structure based on usage volume, which is more typical in B2B models where businesses scale their needs.
Website Language:

The website emphasizes benefits like increased traffic, higher search rankings, and time savings. These address pain points common to businesses.
Overall: While individuals might find ZimmWriter useful for personal blogging, its emphasis on SEO, bulk content generation, and features like Scraping Surgeon suggest it's primarily designed to serve the needs of businesses and agencies.

immagine del profilo
Write a objective overview about what it does for g2 website
Here's an objective overview of ZimmWriter suitable for a G2 website, along with some additional notes to make it more compelling:

ZimmWriter: AI-Powered Content Generation for Efficient Bloggers and SEOs

What it Does:

Streamlines content creation: ZimmWriter leverages OpenAI's language models to help users generate various content types, including blog articles, website copy, and more.
SEO-Focused Tools: Features like the SEO Blog Writer and Topical Authority Generator aid in crafting search engine optimized content designed to improve rankings.
Bulk Content Management: Ideal for agencies or high-volume bloggers, ZimmWriter allows users to manage multiple content projects simultaneously.
Advanced Features: Scraping Surgeon provides precise extraction of content from other websites, while AI image generation (using Midjourney integration) helps to visually enhance your articles.
Key Benefits

Saves time: Automate parts of the content creation process for greater efficiency.
Improves search visibility: Helps craft content tailored to rank higher on search engines.
Enhances workflow: Manage content projects in bulk for streamlined processes.
Ideal For:

Content marketers
Bloggers focused on SEO
Agencies managing content for multiple clients

what_is:
Gatsboy is an international tech company that is empowering local businesses to get online. We don’t just build websites with purpose — ﻿we’re there for each step of the journey, providing all the tools and support that small businesses need to boost their online presence.

Founder Chris Nutbeen was frustrated with the options available to small businesses when trying to build a DIY website that would actually help them. With a vision to use modern web technology to provide a platform, paired with a service, he could lower the bar to offering a better way to perform online. 

In 2018, Chris created Gatsboy as a way to get independent businesses online and help them succeed. Our team of over 30 professionals work every day to improve the outcomes for independent businesses who need hands-on support to grow.

At Gatsboy we believe that customers should have more choice and transparency, and we’re helping small businesses make better decisions when it comes to software & marketing.
